   19: -module(map_no_opt_SUITE).
   20: -export([all/0, suite/0, init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   21:          init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2,
   22:          groups/0]).
   23: 
   24: -export([t_build_and_match_literals/1, t_build_and_match_literals_large/1,
   25:          t_update_literals/1, t_update_literals_large/1,

   27:          t_update_map_expressions/1,

   57:          t_bif_map_to_list/1,
   58:          t_bif_map_from_list/1,
   59:          t_bif_map_next/1,
   60:

   62:          t_erlang_hash/1,

   92:          t_large_unequal_bins_same_hash_bug/1]).
   93: 
   94: %% Benchmarks
   95: -export([benchmarks/1]).
   96: 
   97: -include_lib("stdlib/include/ms_transform.hrl").
   98: 
   99: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct_event.hrl").
  100: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
  101: 
  102: -define(CHECK(Cond,Term),
  103: 	case (catch (Cond)) of
  104: 	    true -> true;
  105: 	    _ -> io:format("###### CHECK FAILED ######~nINPUT:  ~p~n", [Term]),
  106: 		 exit(Term)
  107: 	end).
  108: 
  109: suite() -> [].
  110: 
  111: all() ->
  112:     [{group,main}, benchmarks].
  113: 
  114: groups() ->
  115:     [{main,[],
  116:       [t_build_and_match_literals, t_build_and_match_literals_large,
  117:        t_update_literals, t_update_literals_large,
  118:        t_match_and_update_literals, t_match_and_update_literals_large,
  119:        t_update_map_expressions,
  120:        t_update_assoc, t_update_assoc_large,
  121:        t_update_exact, t_update_exact_large,
  122:        t_guard_bifs,
  123:        t_guard_sequence, t_guard_sequence_large,
  124:        t_guard_update, t_guard_update_large,
  125:        t_guard_receive, t_guard_receive_large,
  126:        t_guard_fun, t_list_comprehension,
  127:        t_update_deep,
  128:        t_map_equal, t_map_compare,
  129:        t_map_sort_literals,
  130: 
  131:        %% Specific Map BIFs
  132:        t_bif_map_get,t_bif_map_find,t_bif_map_is_key,
  133:        t_bif_map_keys, t_bif_map_merge, t_bif_map_new,
  134:        t_bif_map_put,
  135:        t_bif_map_remove,
  136:        t_bif_map_take, t_bif_map_take_large,
  137:        t_bif_map_update,
  138:        t_bif_map_values,
  139:        t_bif_map_to_list, t_bif_map_from_list,
  140:        t_bif_map_next,
  141: 
  142:        %% erlang
  143:        t_erlang_hash, t_map_encode_decode,
  144:        t_gc_rare_map_overflow,
  145:        t_map_size, t_map_get, t_is_map,
  146: 
  147:        %% non specific BIF related
  148:        t_bif_build_and_check,
  149:        t_bif_merge_and_check,
  150: 
  151:        %% maps module
  152:        t_maps_fold, t_maps_map,
  153:        t_maps_size, t_maps_without,
  154: 
  155: 
  156:        %% Other functions
  157:        t_hashmap_balance,
  158:        t_erts_internal_order,
  159:        t_erts_internal_hash,
  160:        t_pdict,
  161:        t_ets,
  162:        t_tracing,
  163:        t_hash_entropy,
  164: 
  165:        %% instruction-level tests
  166:        t_has_map_fields,
  167:        t_get_map_elements,
  168:        y_regs,
  169: 
  170:        %% Bugs
  171:        t_large_unequal_bins_same_hash_bug]},
  172:     {benchmarks, [{repeat,10}], [benchmarks]}].
  173: 
  174: run_once() ->
  175:     case ?MODULE of
  176: 	map_SUITE ->
  177:             %% Canononical module name. Run these cases.
  178:             [{group,once}];
  179:         _ ->
  180:             %% Cloned module. Don't run.
  181:             []
  182:     end.
  183: 
  184: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  185:     A0 = case application:start(sasl) of
  186: 	     ok -> [sasl];
  187: 	     _ -> []
  188: 	 end,
  189:     A = case application:start(os_mon) of
  190: 	     ok -> [os_mon|A0];
  191: 	     _ -> A0
  192: 	 end,
  193:     [{started_apps, A}|Config].
  194: 
  195: end_per_suite(Config) ->
  196:     As = proplists:get_value(started_apps, Config),
  197:     lists:foreach(fun (A) -> application:stop(A) end, As),
  198:     Config.
  199: 
  200: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  201:     Config.
  202: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  203:     erts_test_utils:ept_check_leaked_nodes(Config).
  204: 
  205: 
  206: %% tests
  207: 
  208: t_build_and_match_literals(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  209:     #{} = id(#{}),
  210:     #{1:=a} = id(#{1=>a}),
  211:     #{1:=a,2:=b} = id(#{1=>a,2=>b}),
  212:     #{1:=a,2:=b,3:="c"} = id(#{1=>a,2=>b,3=>"c"}),
  213:     #{1:=a,2:=b,3:="c","4":="d"} = id(#{1=>a,2=>b,3=>"c","4"=>"d"}),
  214:     #{1:=a,2:=b,3:="c","4":="d",<<"5">>:=<<"e">>} =
  215: 	id(#{1=>a,2=>b,3=>"c","4"=>"d",<<"5">>=><<"e">>}),
  216:     #{1:=a,2:=b,3:="c","4":="d",<<"5">>:=<<"e">>,{"6",7}:="f"} =
  217: 	id(#{1=>a,2=>b,3=>"c","4"=>"d",<<"5">>=><<"e">>,{"6",7}=>"f"}),
  218:     #{1:=a,2:=b,3:="c","4":="d",<<"5">>:=<<"e">>,{"6",7}:="f",8:=g} =
  219: 	id(#{1=>a,2=>b,3=>"c","4"=>"d",<<"5">>=><<"e">>,{"6",7}=>"f",8=>g}),
  220: 
  221:     #{[]:=a,42.0:=b,x:={x,y},[a,b]:=list} =
  222:          id(#{[]=>a,42.0=>b,x=>{x,y},[a,b]=>list}),
  223: 
  224:     #{<<"hi all">> := 1} = id(#{<<"hi",32,"all">> => 1}),
  225: 
  226:     #{a:=X,a:=X=3,b:=4} = id(#{a=>3,b=>4}), % weird but ok =)
  227: 
  228:     #{ a:=#{ b:=#{c := third, b:=second}}, b:=first} =
  229: 	id(#{ b=>first, a=>#{ b=>#{c => third, b=> second}}}),
  230: 
  231:     M = #{ map_1=>#{ map_2=>#{value_3 => third}, value_2=> second}, value_1=>first},
  232:     M = #{ map_1:=#{ map_2:=#{value_3 := third}, value_2:= second}, value_1:=first} =
  233: 	 id(#{ map_1=>#{ map_2=>#{value_3 => third}, value_2=> second}, value_1=>first}),
  234: 
  235:     %% error case
  236:     %V = 32,
  237:     %{'EXIT',{{badmatch,_},_}} = (catch (#{<<"hi all">> => 1} = id(#{<<"hi",V,"all">> => 1}))),
  238:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,_},_}} = (catch (#{x:=3,x:=2} = id(#{x=>3}))),
  239:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,_},_}} = (catch (#{x:=2} = id(#{x=>3}))),
  240:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,_},_}} = (catch (#{x:=3} = id({a,b,c}))),
  241:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,_},_}} = (catch (#{x:=3} = id(#{y=>3}))),
  242:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,_},_}} = (catch (#{x:=3} = id(#{x=>"three"}))),
  243:     ok.
  244: 
  245: t_build_and_match_literals_large(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  246:     % normal non-repeating
  247:     M0 = id(#{ 10=>a0,20=>b0,30=>"c0","40"=>"d0",<<"50">>=>"e0",{["00"]}=>"10",
  248:                11=>a1,21=>b1,31=>"c1","41"=>"d1",<<"51">>=>"e1",{["01"]}=>"11",
  249:                12=>a2,22=>b2,32=>"c2","42"=>"d2",<<"52">>=>"e2",{["02"]}=>"12",
  250:                13=>a3,23=>b3,33=>"c3","43"=>"d3",<<"53">>=>"e3",{["03"]}=>"13",
  251:                14=>a4,24=>b4,34=>"c4","44"=>"d4",<<"54">>=>"e4",{["04"]}=>"14",
  252: 
  253:                15=>a5,25=>b5,35=>"c5","45"=>"d5",<<"55">>=>"e5",{["05"]}=>"15",
  254:                16=>a6,26=>b6,36=>"c6","46"=>"d6",<<"56">>=>"e6",{["06"]}=>"16",
  255:                17=>a7,27=>b7,37=>"c7","47"=>"d7",<<"57">>=>"e7",{["07"]}=>"17",
  256:                18=>a8,28=>b8,38=>"c8","48"=>"d8",<<"58">>=>"e8",{["08"]}=>"18",
  257:                19=>a9,29=>b9,39=>"c9","49"=>"d9",<<"59">>=>"e9",{["09"]}=>"19" }),
  258: 
  259:     #{10:=a0,20:=b0,30:="c0","40":="d0",<<"50">>:="e0",{["00"]}:="10"} = M0,
  260:     #{11:=a1,21:=b1,31:="c1","41":="d1",<<"51">>:="e1",{["01"]}:="11"} = M0,
  261:     #{12:=a2,22:=b2,32:="c2","42":="d2",<<"52">>:="e2",{["02"]}:="12"} = M0,
  262:     #{13:=a3,23:=b3,33:="c3","43":="d3",<<"53">>:="e3",{["03"]}:="13"} = M0,
  263:     #{14:=a4,24:=b4,34:="c4","44":="d4",<<"54">>:="e4",{["04"]}:="14"} = M0,
  264: 
  265:     #{15:=a5,25:=b5,35:="c5","45":="d5",<<"55">>:="e5",{["05"]}:="15"} = M0,
  266:     #{16:=a6,26:=b6,36:="c6","46":="d6",<<"56">>:="e6",{["06"]}:="16"} = M0,
  267:     #{17:=a7,27:=b7,37:="c7","47":="d7",<<"57">>:="e7",{["07"]}:="17"} = M0,
  268:     #{18:=a8,28:=b8,38:="c8","48":="d8",<<"58">>:="e8",{["08"]}:="18"} = M0,
  269:     #{19:=a9,29:=b9,39:="c9","49":="d9",<<"59">>:="e9",{["09"]}:="19"} = M0,
  270: 
  271:     60 = map_size(M0),
  272:     60 = maps:size(M0),
  273:     60 = apply(erlang, id(map_size), [M0]),
  274:     60 = apply(maps, id(size), [M0]),
  275: 
  276:     % with repeating
  277:     M1 = id(#{ 10=>a0,20=>b0,30=>"c0","40"=>"d0",<<"50">>=>"e0",{["00"]}=>"10",
  278:                11=>a1,21=>b1,31=>"c1","41"=>"d1",<<"51">>=>"e1",{["01"]}=>"11",
  279:                12=>a2,22=>b2,32=>"c2","42"=>"d2",<<"52">>=>"e2",{["02"]}=>"12",
  280:                13=>a3,23=>b3,33=>"c3","43"=>"d3",<<"53">>=>"e3",{["03"]}=>"13",
  281:                14=>a4,24=>b4,34=>"c4","44"=>"d4",<<"54">>=>"e4",{["04"]}=>"14",
  282: 
  283:                10=>na0,20=>nb0,30=>"nc0","40"=>"nd0",<<"50">>=>"ne0",{["00"]}=>"n10",
  284:                11=>na1,21=>nb1,31=>"nc1","41"=>"nd1",<<"51">>=>"ne1",{["01"]}=>"n11",
  285:                12=>na2,22=>nb2,32=>"nc2","42"=>"nd2",<<"52">>=>"ne2",{["02"]}=>"n12",
  286: 
  287:                15=>a5,25=>b5,35=>"c5","45"=>"d5",<<"55">>=>"e5",{["05"]}=>"15",
  288:                16=>a6,26=>b6,36=>"c6","46"=>"d6",<<"56">>=>"e6",{["06"]}=>"16",
  289:                17=>a7,27=>b7,37=>"c7","47"=>"d7",<<"57">>=>"e7",{["07"]}=>"17",
  290: 
  291:                13=>na3,23=>nb3,33=>"nc3","43"=>"nd3",<<"53">>=>"ne3",{["03"]}=>"n13",
  292:                14=>na4,24=>nb4,34=>"nc4","44"=>"nd4",<<"54">>=>"ne4",{["04"]}=>"n14",
  293: 
  294:                18=>a8,28=>b8,38=>"c8","48"=>"d8",<<"58">>=>"e8",{["08"]}=>"18",
  295:                19=>a9,29=>b9,39=>"c9","49"=>"d9",<<"59">>=>"e9",{["09"]}=>"19" }),
  296: 
  297:     #{10:=na0,20:=nb0,30:="nc0","40":="nd0",<<"50">>:="ne0",{["00"]}:="n10"} = M1,
  298:     #{11:=na1,21:=nb1,31:="nc1","41":="nd1",<<"51">>:="ne1",{["01"]}:="n11"} = M1,
  299:     #{12:=na2,22:=nb2,32:="nc2","42":="nd2",<<"52">>:="ne2",{["02"]}:="n12"} = M1,
  300:     #{13:=na3,23:=nb3,33:="nc3","43":="nd3",<<"53">>:="ne3",{["03"]}:="n13"} = M1,
  301:     #{14:=na4,24:=nb4,34:="nc4","44":="nd4",<<"54">>:="ne4",{["04"]}:="n14"} = M1,
  302: 
  303:     #{15:=a5,25:=b5,35:="c5","45":="d5",<<"55">>:="e5",{["05"]}:="15"} = M1,
  304:     #{16:=a6,26:=b6,36:="c6","46":="d6",<<"56">>:="e6",{["06"]}:="16"} = M1,
  305:     #{17:=a7,27:=b7,37:="c7","47":="d7",<<"57">>:="e7",{["07"]}:="17"} = M1,
  306:     #{18:=a8,28:=b8,38:="c8","48":="d8",<<"58">>:="e8",{["08"]}:="18"} = M1,
  307:     #{19:=a9,29:=b9,39:="c9","49":="d9",<<"59">>:="e9",{["09"]}:="19"} = M1,
  308: 
  309:     60 = map_size(M1),
  310:     60 = maps:size(M1),
  311:     60 = apply(erlang, id(map_size), [M1]),
  312:     60 = apply(maps, id(size), [M1]),
  313: 
  314:     % with floats
  315: 
  316:     M2 = id(#{ 10=>a0,20=>b0,30=>"c0","40"=>"d0",<<"50">>=>"e0",{["00"]}=>"10",
  317:                11=>a1,21=>b1,31=>"c1","41"=>"d1",<<"51">>=>"e1",{["01"]}=>"11",
  318:                12=>a2,22=>b2,32=>"c2","42"=>"d2",<<"52">>=>"e2",{["02"]}=>"12",
  319:                13=>a3,23=>b3,33=>"c3","43"=>"d3",<<"53">>=>"e3",{["03"]}=>"13",
  320:                14=>a4,24=>b4,34=>"c4","44"=>"d4",<<"54">>=>"e4",{["04"]}=>"14",
  321: 
  322:                15=>a5,25=>b5,35=>"c5","45"=>"d5",<<"55">>=>"e5",{["05"]}=>"15",
  323:                16=>a6,26=>b6,36=>"c6","46"=>"d6",<<"56">>=>"e6",{["06"]}=>"16",
  324:                17=>a7,27=>b7,37=>"c7","47"=>"d7",<<"57">>=>"e7",{["07"]}=>"17",
  325:                18=>a8,28=>b8,38=>"c8","48"=>"d8",<<"58">>=>"e8",{["08"]}=>"18",
  326:                19=>a9,29=>b9,39=>"c9","49"=>"d9",<<"59">>=>"e9",{["09"]}=>"19",
  327: 
  328:                10.0=>fa0,20.0=>fb0,30.0=>"fc0",
  329:                11.0=>fa1,21.0=>fb1,31.0=>"fc1",
  330:                12.0=>fa2,22.0=>fb2,32.0=>"fc2",
  331:                13.0=>fa3,23.0=>fb3,33.0=>"fc3",
  332:                14.0=>fa4,24.0=>fb4,34.0=>"fc4",
  333: 
  334:                15.0=>fa5,25.0=>fb5,35.0=>"fc5",
  335:                16.0=>fa6,26.0=>fb6,36.0=>"fc6",
  336:                17.0=>fa7,27.0=>fb7,37.0=>"fc7",
  337:                18.0=>fa8,28.0=>fb8,38.0=>"fc8",
  338:                19.0=>fa9,29.0=>fb9,39.0=>"fc9"}),
  339: 
  340:     #{10:=a0,20:=b0,30:="c0","40":="d0",<<"50">>:="e0",{["00"]}:="10"} = M2,
  341:     #{11:=a1,21:=b1,31:="c1","41":="d1",<<"51">>:="e1",{["01"]}:="11"} = M2,
  342:     #{12:=a2,22:=b2,32:="c2","42":="d2",<<"52">>:="e2",{["02"]}:="12"} = M2,
  343:     #{13:=a3,23:=b3,33:="c3","43":="d3",<<"53">>:="e3",{["03"]}:="13"} = M2,
  344:     #{14:=a4,24:=b4,34:="c4","44":="d4",<<"54">>:="e4",{["04"]}:="14"} = M2,
  345: 
  346:     #{15:=a5,25:=b5,35:="c5","45":="d5",<<"55">>:="e5",{["05"]}:="15"} = M2,
  347:     #{16:=a6,26:=b6,36:="c6","46":="d6",<<"56">>:="e6",{["06"]}:="16"} = M2,
  348:     #{17:=a7,27:=b7,37:="c7","47":="d7",<<"57">>:="e7",{["07"]}:="17"} = M2,
  349:     #{18:=a8,28:=b8,38:="c8","48":="d8",<<"58">>:="e8",{["08"]}:="18"} = M2,
  350:     #{19:=a9,29:=b9,39:="c9","49":="d9",<<"59">>:="e9",{["09"]}:="19"} = M2,
  351: 
  352:     #{10.0:=fa0,20.0:=fb0,30.0:="fc0","40":="d0",<<"50">>:="e0",{["00"]}:="10"} = M2,
  353:     #{11.0:=fa1,21.0:=fb1,31.0:="fc1","41":="d1",<<"51">>:="e1",{["01"]}:="11"} = M2,
  354:     #{12.0:=fa2,22.0:=fb2,32.0:="fc2","42":="d2",<<"52">>:="e2",{["02"]}:="12"} = M2,
  355:     #{13.0:=fa3,23.0:=fb3,33.0:="fc3","43":="d3",<<"53">>:="e3",{["03"]}:="13"} = M2,
  356:     #{14.0:=fa4,24.0:=fb4,34.0:="fc4","44":="d4",<<"54">>:="e4",{["04"]}:="14"} = M2,

  594:                   17=>a7,27=>b7,37=>"c7","47"=>"d7",<<"57">>=>"e7",{["07"]}=>"17",
  595:                   18=>a8,28=>b8,38=>"c8","48"=>"d8",<<"58">>=>"e8",{["08"]}=>"18",
  596:                   19=>a9,29=>b9,39=>"c9","49"=>"d9",<<"59">>=>"e9",{["09"]}=>"19" } => "large map key 1",
  597: 
  598:                #{ 10=>a0,20=>b0,30=>"c0","40"=>"d0",<<"50">>=>"e0",{["00"]}=>"10",
  599:                   11=>a1,21=>b1,31=>"c1","41"=>"d1",<<"51">>=>"e1",{["01"]}=>"11",

  609:

  621: 
  622:     #{ #{ one => small, map => key }    := "small map key 1",
  623:        #{ second => small, map => key } := "small map key 2",
  624:        #{ third => small, map => key }  := "small map key 3" } = M5,
  625: 
  626:     #{ #{ 10=>a0,20=>b0,30=>"c0","40"=>"d0",<<"50">>=>"e0",{["00"]}=>"10",
  627:           11=>a1,21=>b1,31=>"c1","41"=>"d1",<<"51">>=>"e1",{["01"]}=>"11",

  636:           19=>a9,29=>b9,39=>"c9","49"=>"d9",<<"59">>=>"e9",{["09"]}=>"19" } := "large map key 1",
  637: 
  638:        #{ 10=>a0,20=>b0,30=>"c0","40"=>"d0",<<"50">>=>"e0",{["00"]}=>"10",
  639:           11=>a1,21=>b1,31=>"c1","41"=>"d1",<<"51">>=>"e1",{["01"]}=>"11",
  640:           12=>a2,22=>b2,32=>"c2","42"=>"d2",<<"52">>=>"e2",{["02"]}=>"12",

  647:           18=>a8,28=>b8,38=>"c8","48"=>"d8",<<"58">>=>"e8",{["08"]}=>"18",
  648:           19=>a9,29=>b9,39=>"c9","49"=>"d9",<<"59">>=>"e9",{["09"]}=>"19" } := "large map key 2" } = M5,
  649: 
  650:     95 = map_size(M5),
  651:     95 = maps:size(M5),
  652:     95 = apply(erlang, id(map_size), [M5]),
  653:     95 = apply(maps, id(size), [M5]),
  654: 
  655:     %% remember
  656: 
  657:     #{10:=a0,20:=b0,30:="c0","40":="d0",<<"50">>:="e0",{["00"]}:="10"} = M0,
  658:     #{11:=a1,21:=b1,31:="c1","41":="d1",<<"51">>:="e1",{["01"]}:="11"} = M0,
  659:     #{12:=a2,22:=b2,32:="c2","42":="d2",<<"52">>:="e2",{["02"]}:="12"} = M0,
  660:     #{13:=a3,23:=b3,33:="c3","43":="d3",<<"53">>:="e3",{["03"]}:="13"} = M0,
  661:     #{14:=a4,24:=b4,34:="c4","44":="d4",<<"54">>:="e4",{["04"]}:="14"} = M0,
  662: 
  663:     #{10:=na0,20:=nb0,30:="nc0","40":="nd0",<<"50">>:="ne0",{["00"]}:="n10"} = M1,
  664:     #{11:=na1,21:=nb1,31:="nc1","41":="nd1",<<"51">>:="ne1",{["01"]}:="n11"} = M1,
  665:     #{12:=na2,22:=nb2,32:="nc2","42":="nd2",<<"52">>:="ne2",{["02"]}:="n12"} = M1,
  666:     #{13:=na3,23:=nb3,33:="nc3","43":="nd3",<<"53">>:="ne3",{["03"]}:="n13"} = M1,
  667:     #{14:=na4,24:=nb4,34:="nc4","44":="nd4",<<"54">>:="ne4",{["04"]}:="n14"} = M1,
  668: 
  669:     #{15:=a5,25:=b5,35:="c5","45":="d5",<<"55">>:="e5",{["05"]}:="15"} = M1,
  670:     #{16:=a6,26:=b6,36:="c6","46":="d6",<<"56">>:="e6",{["06"]}:="16"} = M1,
  671:     #{17:=a7,27:=b7,37:="c7","47":="d7",<<"57">>:="e7",{["07"]}:="17"} = M1,
  672:     #{18:=a8,28:=b8,38:="c8","48":="d8",<<"58">>:="e8",{["08"]}:="18"} = M1,
  673:     #{19:=a9,29:=b9,39:="c9","49":="d9",<<"59">>:="e9",{["09"]}:="19"} = M1,
  674: 
  675:     #{15:=a5,25:=b5,35:="c5","45":="d5",<<"55">>:="e5",{["05"]}:="15"} = M2,
  676:     #{16:=a6,26:=b6,36:="c6","46":="d6",<<"56">>:="e6",{["06"]}:="16"} = M2,
  677:     #{17:=a7,27:=b7,37:="c7","47":="d7",<<"57">>:="e7",{["07"]}:="17"} = M2,
  678:     #{18:=a8,28:=b8,38:="c8","48":="d8",<<"58">>:="e8",{["08"]}:="18"} = M2,
  679:     #{19:=a9,29:=b9,39:="c9","49":="d9",<<"59">>:="e9",{["09"]}:="19"} = M2,
  680: 
  681:     #{10.0:=fa0,20.0:=fb0,30.0:="fc0","40":="d0",<<"50">>:="e0",{["00"]}:="10"} = M2,
  682:     #{11.0:=fa1,21.0:=fb1,31.0:="fc1","41":="d1",<<"51">>:="e1",{["01"]}:="11"} = M2,
  683:     #{12.0:=fa2,22.0:=fb2,32.0:="fc2","42":="d2",<<"52">>:="e2",{["02"]}:="12"} = M2,
  684:     #{13.0:=fa3,23.0:=fb3,33.0:="fc3","43":="d3",<<"53">>:="e3",{["03"]}:="13"} = M2,
  685:     #{14.0:=fa4,24.0:=fb4,34.0:="fc4","44":="d4",<<"54">>:="e4",{["04"]}:="14"} = M2,
  686: 
  687:     #{15:=a5,25:=b5,35:="c5","45":="d5",<<"55">>:="e5",{["05"]}:="15"} = M3,
  688:     #{16:=a6,26:=b6,36:="c6","46":="d6",<<"56">>:="e6",{["06"]}:="16"} = M3,
  689:     #{17:=a7,27:=b7,37:="c7","47":="d7",<<"57">>:="e7",{["07"]}:="17"} = M3,
  690:     #{18:=a8,28:=b8,38:="c8","48":="d8",<<"58">>:="e8",{["08"]}:="18"} = M3,
  691:     #{19:=a9,29:=b9,39:="c9","49":="d9",<<"59">>:="e9",{["09"]}:="19"} = M3,
  692: 
  693:     #{10.0:=fa0,20.0:=fb0,30.0:="fc0","40":="d0",<<"50">>:="e0",{["00"]}:="10"} = M3,
  694:     #{11.0:=fa1,21.0:=fb1,31.0:="fc1","41":="d1",<<"51">>:="e1",{["01"]}:="11"} = M3,
  695:     #{12.0:=fa2,22.0:=fb2,32.0:="fc2","42":="d2",<<"52">>:="e2",{["02"]}:="12"} = M3,
  696:     #{13.0:=fa3,23.0:=fb3,33.0:="fc3","43":="d3",<<"53">>:="e3",{["03"]}:="13"} = M3,
  697:     #{14.0:=fa4,24.0:=fb4,34.0:="fc4","44":="d4",<<"54">>:="e4",{["04"]}:="14"} = M3,
  698: 
  699:     #{15.0:=fa5,25.0:=fb5,35.0:="fc5","45":="d5",<<"55">>:="e5",{["05"]}:="15"} = M3,
  700:     #{16.0:=fa6,26.0:=fb6,36.0:="fc6","46":="d6",<<"56">>:="e6",{["06"]}:="16"} = M3,
  701:     #{17.0:=fa7,27.0:=fb7,37.0:="fc7","47":="d7",<<"57">>:="e7",{["07"]}:="17"} = M3,
  702:     #{18.0:=fa8,28.0:=fb8,38.0:="fc8","48":="d8",<<"58">>:="e8",{["08"]}:="18"} = M3,
  703:     #{19.0:=fa9,29.0:=fb9,39.0:="fc9","49":="d9",<<"59">>:="e9",{["09"]}:="19"} = M3,
  704: 
  705:     #{36893488147419103232:=big1,67108863:=big8,"45":="d5",<<"55">>:="e5",{["05"]}:="15"} = M3,
  706:     #{147573952589676412928:=big3,8589934592:=big6,"46":="d6",<<"56">>:="e6",{["06"]}:="16"} = M3,
  707:     #{4294967296:=big5,18446744073709551616:=big4,"47":="d7",<<"57">>:="e7",{["07"]}:="17"} = M3,
  708:     #{4294967295:=big7,73786976294838206464:=big2,"48":="d8",<<"58">>:="e8",{["08"]}:="18"} = M3,
  709: 
  710:     ok.
  711: 
  712: 
  713: t_map_size(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  714:     0 = map_size(id(#{})),
  715:     1 = map_size(id(#{a=>1})),
  716:     1 = map_size(id(#{a=>"wat"})),
  717:     2 = map_size(id(#{a=>1, b=>2})),
  718:     3 = map_size(id(#{a=>1, b=>2, b=>"3","33"=><<"n">>})),
  719: 
  720:     true = map_is_size(#{a=>1}, 1),
  721:     true = map_is_size(#{a=>1, a=>2}, 1),
  722:     M = #{ "a" => 1, "b" => 2},
  723:     true  = map_is_size(M, 2),
  724:     false = map_is_size(M, 3),
  725:     true  = map_is_size(M#{ "a" => 2}, 2),
  726:     false = map_is_size(M#{ "c" => 2}, 2),
  727: 
  728:     Ks = [build_key(fun(K) -> <<1,K:32,1>> end,I)||I<-lists:seq(1,100)],
  729:     ok = build_and_check_size(Ks,0,#{}),
  730: 
  731:     %% try deep collisions
  732:     %% statistically we get another subtree at 50k -> 100k elements
  733:     %% Try to be nice and don't use too much memory in the testcase,
  734: 
  735:     N  = 500000,
  736:     Is = lists:seq(1,N),
  737:     N  = map_size(maps:from_list([{I,I}||I<-Is])),
  738:     N  = map_size(maps:from_list([{<<I:32>>,I}||I<-Is])),
  739:     N  = map_size(maps:from_list([{integer_to_list(I),I}||I<-Is])),
  740:     N  = map_size(maps:from_list([{float(I),I}||I<-Is])),
  741: 
  742:     %% Error cases.
  743:     do_badmap(fun(T) ->
  744:                     {'EXIT',{{badmap,T},_}} =
  745:                       (catch map_size(T))
  746:               end),
  747:     ok.
  748: 
  749: t_map_get(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  750:     %% small map
  751:     1    = map_get(a, id(#{a=>1})),
  752:     2    = map_get(b, id(#{a=>1, b=>2})),
  753:     "hi" = map_get("hello", id(#{a=>1, "hello"=>"hi"})),
  754:     "tuple hi" = map_get({1,1.0}, id(#{a=>a, {1,1.0}=>"tuple hi"})),
  755: 
  756:     M0    = id(#{ k1=>"v1", <<"k2">> => <<"v3">> }),
  757:     "v4" = map_get(<<"k2">>, M0#{<<"k2">> => "v4"}),
  758: 
  759:     %% large map
  760:     M1   = maps:from_list([{I,I}||I<-lists:seq(1,100)] ++
  761: 			  [{a,1},{b,2},{"hello","hi"},{{1,1.0},"tuple hi"},
  762: 			   {k1,"v1"},{<<"k2">>,"v3"}]),
  763:     1    = map_get(a, M1),
  764:     2    = map_get(b, M1),
  765:     "hi" = map_get("hello", M1),
  766:     "tuple hi" = map_get({1,1.0}, M1),
  767:     "v3" = map_get(<<"k2">>, M1),
  768: 
  769:     %% error cases
  770:     do_badmap(fun(T) ->
  771: 		      {'EXIT',{{badmap,T},[{erlang,map_get,_,_}|_]}} =
  772: 			  (catch map_get(a, T))
  773: 	      end),
  774: 
  775:     {'EXIT',{{badkey,{1,1}},[{erlang,map_get,_,_}|_]}} =
  776: 	(catch map_get({1,1}, id(#{{1,1.0}=>"tuple"}))),
  777:     {'EXIT',{{badkey,a},[{erlang,map_get,_,_}|_]}} = (catch map_get(a, id(#{}))),
  778:     {'EXIT',{{badkey,a},[{erlang,map_get,_,_}|_]}} =
  779: 	(catch map_get(a, id(#{b=>1, c=>2}))),
  780: 
  781:     %% in guards
  782:     M2 = id(#{a=>1}),
  783:     true = if map_get(a, M2) =:= 1 -> true; true -> false end,
  784:     false = if map_get(x, M2) =:= 1 -> true; true -> false end,
  785:     do_badmap(fun
  786:         (T) when map_get(x, T) =:= 1 -> ok;
  787:         (T) -> false = is_map(T)
  788:     end),
  789:     ok.
  790: 
  791: t_is_map_key(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  792:     %% small map
  793:     true = is_map_key(a, id(#{a=>1})),
  794:     true = is_map_key(b, id(#{a=>1, b=>2})),
  795:     true = is_map_key("hello", id(#{a=>1, "hello"=>"hi"})),
  796:     true = is_map_key({1,1.0}, id(#{a=>a, {1,1.0}=>"tuple hi"})),
  797: 
  798:     M0   = id(#{ k1=>"v1", <<"k2">> => <<"v3">> }),
  799:     true = is_map_key(<<"k2">>, M0#{<<"k2">> => "v4"}),
  800: 
  801:     %% large map
  802:     M1   = maps:from_list([{I,I}||I<-lists:seq(1,100)] ++
  803: 			  [{a,1},{b,2},{"hello","hi"},{{1,1.0},"tuple hi"},
  804: 			   {k1,"v1"},{<<"k2">>,"v3"}]),
  805:     true = is_map_key(a, M1),
  806:     true = is_map_key(b, M1),
  807:     true = is_map_key("hello", M1),
  808:     true = is_map_key({1,1.0}, M1),
  809:     true = is_map_key(<<"k2">>, M1),
  810: 
  811:     %% error cases
  812:     do_badmap(fun(T) ->
  813: 		      {'EXIT',{{badmap,T},[{erlang,is_map_key,_,_}|_]}} =
  814: 			  (catch is_map_key(a, T))
  815: 	      end),
  816: 
  817:     false = is_map_key({1,1}, id(#{{1,1.0}=>"tuple"})),
  818:     false = is_map_key(a, id(#{})),
  819:     false = is_map_key(a, id(#{b=>1, c=>2})),
  820: 
  821:     %% in guards
  822:     M2 = id(#{a=>1}),
  823:     true = if is_map_key(a, M2) -> true; true -> false end,
  824:     false = if is_map_key(x, M2) -> true; true -> false end,
  825:     do_badmap(fun
  826:         (T) when is_map_key(T, x) =:= 1 -> ok;
  827:         (T) -> false = is_map(T)
  828:     end),
  829:     ok.
  830: 
  831: build_and_check_size([K|Ks],N,M0) ->
  832:     N = map_size(M0),
  833:     M1 = M0#{ K => K },
  834:     build_and_check_size(Ks,N + 1,M1);
  835: build_and_check_size([],N,M) ->
  836:     N = map_size(M),
  837:     ok.
  838: 
  839: map_is_size(M,N) when map_size(M) =:= N -> true;
  840: map_is_size(_,_) -> false.
  841: 
  842: t_is_map(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  843:     true = is_map(#{}),
  844:     true = is_map(#{a=>1}),
  845:     false = is_map({a,b}),
  846:     false = is_map(x),
  847:     if is_map(#{}) -> ok end,
  848:     if is_map(#{b=>1}) -> ok end,
  849:     if not is_map([1,2,3]) -> ok end,
  850:     if not is_map(x) -> ok end,
  851:     ok.
  852: 
  853: % test map updates without matching
  854: t_update_literals_large(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  855:     Map = id(#{ 10=>id(a0),20=>b0,30=>id("c0"),"40"=>"d0",<<"50">>=>id("e0"),{["00"]}=>"10",
  856:                 11=>id(a1),21=>b1,31=>id("c1"),"41"=>"d1",<<"51">>=>id("e1"),{["01"]}=>"11",
  857:                 12=>id(a2),22=>b2,32=>id("c2"),"42"=>"d2",<<"52">>=>id("e2"),{["02"]}=>"12",
  858:                 13=>id(a3),23=>b3,33=>id("c3"),"43"=>"d3",<<"53">>=>id("e3"),{["03"]}=>"13",
  859:                 14=>id(a4),24=>b4,34=>id("c4"),"44"=>"d4",<<"54">>=>id("e4"),{["04"]}=>"14",
  860: 
  861:                 15=>id(a5),25=>b5,35=>id("c5"),"45"=>"d5",<<"55">>=>id("e5"),{["05"]}=>"15",
  862:                 16=>id(a6),26=>b6,36=>id("c6"),"46"=>"d6",<<"56">>=>id("e6"),{["06"]}=>"16",
  863:                 17=>id(a7),27=>b7,37=>id("c7"),"47"=>"d7",<<"57">>=>id("e7"),{["07"]}=>"17",
  864:                 18=>id(a8),28=>b8,38=>id("c8"),"48"=>"d8",<<"58">>=>id("e8"),{["08"]}=>"18",
  865:                 19=>id(a9),29=>b9,39=>id("c9"),"49"=>"d9",<<"59">>=>id("e9"),{["09"]}=>"19",
  866: 
  867:                 10.0=>fa0,20.0=>id(fb0),30.0=>id("fc0"),
  868:                 11.0=>fa1,21.0=>id(fb1),31.0=>id("fc1"),
  869:                 12.0=>fa2,22.0=>id(fb2),32.0=>id("fc2"),
  870:                 13.0=>fa3,23.0=>id(fb3),33.0=>id("fc3"),
  871:                 14.0=>fa4,24.0=>id(fb4),34.0=>id("fc4"),
  872: 
  873:                 15.0=>fa5,25.0=>id(fb5),35.0=>id("fc5"),
  874:                 16.0=>fa6,26.0=>id(fb6),36.0=>id("fc6"),
  875:                 17.0=>fa7,27.0=>id(fb7),37.0=>id("fc7"),
  876:                 18.0=>fa8,28.0=>id(fb8),38.0=>id("fc8"),
  877:                 19.0=>fa9,29.0=>id(fb9),39.0=>id("fc9"),
  878: 
  879:                 #{ one => small, map => key } => id("small map key 1"),
  880:                 #{ second => small, map => key } => "small map key 2",
  881:                 #{ third => small, map => key } => "small map key 3",
  882: 
  883:                 #{ 10=>a0,20=>b0,30=>"c0","40"=>"d0",<<"50">>=>"e0",{["00"]}=>"10",
  884:                    11=>a1,21=>b1,31=>"c1","41"=>"d1",<<"51">>=>"e1",{["01"]}=>"11",
  885:                    12=>a2,22=>b2,32=>"c2","42"=>"d2",<<"52">>=>"e2",{["02"]}=>"12",
  886:                    13=>a3,23=>b3,33=>"c3","43"=>"d3",<<"53">>=>"e3",{["03"]}=>"13",
  887:                    14=>a4,24=>b4,34=>"c4","44"=>"d4",<<"54">>=>"e4",{["04"]}=>"14",
  888: 
  889:                    15=>a5,25=>b5,35=>"c5","45"=>"d5",<<"55">>=>"e5",{["05"]}=>"15",
  890:                    16=>a6,26=>b6,36=>"c6","46"=>"d6",<<"56">>=>"e6",{["06"]}=>"16",
  891:                    17=>a7,27=>b7,37=>"c7","47"=>"d7",<<"57">>=>"e7",{["07"]}=>"17",
  892:                    18=>a8,28=>b8,38=>"c8","48"=>"d8",<<"58">>=>"e8",{["08"]}=>"18",
  893:                    19=>a9,29=>b9,39=>"c9","49"=>"d9",<<"59">>=>"e9",{["09"]}=>"19" } => "large map key 1",
  894: 
  895:                 #{ 10=>a0,20=>b0,30=>"c0","40"=>"d0",<<"50">>=>"e0",{["00"]}=>"10",
  896:                    11=>a1,21=>b1,31=>"c1","41"=>"d1",<<"51">>=>"e1",{["01"]}=>"11",
  897:                    12=>a2,22=>b2,32=>"c2","42"=>"d2",<<"52">>=>"e2",{["02"]}=>"12",
  898:                    13=>a3,23=>b3,33=>"c3","43"=>"d3",<<"53">>=>"e3",{["03"]}=>"13",
  899:                    14=>a4,24=>b4,34=>"c4","44"=>"d4",<<"54">>=>"e4",{["04"]}=>"14",
  900: 
  901:                    15=>a5,25=>b5,35=>"c5","45"=>"d5",<<"55">>=>"e5",{["05"]}=>"15",
  902:                    k16=>a6,k26=>b6,k36=>"c6","46"=>"d6",<<"56">>=>"e6",{["06"]}=>"16",
  903:                    17=>a7,27=>b7,37=>"c7","47"=>"d7",<<"57">>=>"e7",{["07"]}=>"17",
  904:                    18=>a8,28=>b8,38=>"c8","48"=>"d8",<<"58">>=>"e8",{["08"]}=>"18",
  905:                    19=>a9,29=>b9,39=>"c9","49"=>"d9",<<"59">>=>"e9",{["09"]}=>"19" } => id("large map key 2") }),
  906: 
  907:     #{x:="d",q:="4"} = loop_update_literals_x_q(Map, [
  908: 		{"a","1"},{"b","2"},{"c","3"},{"d","4"}
  909: 	]),
  910:     ok.

  912: t_update_literals(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  913:     Map = #{x=>1,y=>2,z=>3,q=>4},
  914:     #{x:="d",q:="4"} = loop_update_literals_x_q(Map, [
  915: 		{"a","1"},{"b","2"},{"c","3"},{"d","4"}
  916: 	]),
  917:     ok.
  918: 
  919: 
  920: loop_update_literals_x_q(Map, []) -> Map;
  921: loop_update_literals_x_q(Map, [{X,Q}|Vs]) ->
  922:     loop_update_literals_x_q(Map#{q=>Q,x=>X},Vs).
  923: 
  924: % test map updates with matching
  925: t_match_and_update_literals(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  926:     Map = #{ x=>0,y=>"untouched",z=>"also untouched",q=>1,
  927:              #{ "one" => small, map => key } => "small map key 1" },
  928:     #{x:=16,q:=21,y:="untouched",z:="also untouched"} = loop_match_and_update_literals_x_q(Map, [
  929: 	    {1,2},{3,4},{5,6},{7,8}
  930: 	]),
  931:     M0 = id(#{ "hi" => "hello", int => 3, <<"key">> => <<"value">>,
  932: 	    4 => number, 18446744073709551629 => wat}),
  933:     M1 = id(#{}),
  934:     M2 = M1#{ "hi" => "hello", int => 3, <<"key">> => <<"value">>,
  935: 	4 => number, 18446744073709551629 => wat},
  936:     M0 = M2,
  937: 
  938:     #{ 4 := another_number, int := 3 } = M2#{ 4 => another_number },
  939:     ok.
  940:

 1010: loop_match_and_update_literals_x_q(Map, []) -> Map;
 1011: loop_match_and_update_literals_x_q(#{ q:=Q0, x:=X0,
 1012:                                      #{ "one" => small, map => key } := "small map key 1" } = Map, [{X,Q}|Vs]) ->
 1013:     loop_match_and_update_literals_x_q(Map#{q=>Q0+Q,x=>X0+X},Vs).
 1014: 
 1015: 
 1016: t_update_map_expressions(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1017:     M = maps:new(),
 1018:     #{ a := 1 } = M#{a => 1},
 1019: 
 1020:     #{ b := 2 } = (maps:new())#{ b => 2 },
 1021: 
 1022:     #{ a :=42, b:=42, c:=42 } = (maps:from_list([{a,1},{b,2},{c,3}]))#{ a := 42, b := 42, c := 42 },
 1023:     #{ "a" :=1, "b":=42, "c":=42 } = (maps:from_list([{"a",1},{"b",2}]))#{ "b" := 42, "c" => 42 },
 1024:     Ks = lists:seq($a,$z),
 1025:     #{ "aa" := {$a,$a}, "ac":=41, "dc":=42 } =
 1026:         (maps:from_list([{[K1,K2],{K1,K2}}|| K1 <- Ks, K2 <- Ks]))#{ "ac" := 41, "dc" => 42 },
 1027: 
 1028:     %% Error cases.
 1029:     do_badmap(fun(T) ->
 1030: 		      {'EXIT',{{badmap,T},_}} =
 1031: 			  (catch (T)#{a:=42,b=>2})
 1032: 	      end),
 1033:     ok.
 1034: 
 1035: t_update_assoc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1036:     M0 = id(#{1=>a,2=>b,3.0=>c,4=>d,5=>e}),
 1037: 
 1038:     M1 = M0#{1=>42,2=>100,4=>[a,b,c]},
 1039:     #{1:=42,2:=100,3.0:=c,4:=[a,b,c],5:=e} = M1,
 1040:     #{1:=42,2:=b,4:=d,5:=e,2.0:=100,3.0:=c,4.0:=[a,b,c]} = M0#{1.0=>float,1:=42,2.0=>wrong,2.0=>100,4.0=>[a,b,c]},
 1041: 
 1042:     M2 = M0#{3.0=>new},
 1043:     #{1:=a,2:=b,3.0:=new,4:=d,5:=e} = M2,
 1044:     M2 = M0#{3.0:=wrong,3.0=>new},
 1045: 
 1046:     %% Errors cases.
 1047:     do_badmap(fun(T) ->
 1048: 		      {'EXIT',{{badmap,T},_}} =
 1049: 			  (catch T#{nonexisting=>val})
 1050: 	      end),
 1051:     ok.
 1052:

 1109:     #{1:=42,2:=100,10.0:=fa0,4:=[a,b,c],25:=b5} = M1,
 1110:     #{ 10:=43, 24:=b4, 15:=a5, 35:="c5", 2.0:=100, 13.0:=fa3, 4.0:=[a,b,c]} =
 1111:         M0#{1.0=>float,10:=43,2.0=>wrong,2.0=>100,4.0=>[a,b,c]},
 1112: 
 1113:     M2 = M0#{13.0=>new},
 1114:     #{10:=a0,20:=b0,13.0:=new,"40":="d0",<<"50">>:="e0"} = M2,

 1118: 
 1119: t_update_exact(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1120:     M0 = id(#{1=>a,2=>b,3.0=>c,4=>d,5=>e}),
 1121: 
 1122:     M1 = M0#{1:=42,2:=100,4:=[a,b,c]},
 1123:     #{1:=42,2:=100,3.0:=c,4:=[a,b,c],5:=e} = M1,
 1124:     M1 = M0#{1:=wrong,1=>42,2=>wrong,2:=100,4:=[a,b,c]},
 1125: 
 1126:     M2 = M0#{3.0:=new},
 1127:     #{1:=a,2:=b,3.0:=new,4:=d,5:=e} = M2,
 1128:     M2 = M0#{3.0=>wrong,3.0:=new},
 1129:     true = M2 =/= M0#{3=>right,3.0:=new},
 1130:     #{ 3 := right, 3.0 := new } = M0#{3=>right,3.0:=new},
 1131: 
 1132:     M3 = id(#{ 1 => val}),
 1133:     #{1 := update2,1.0 := new_val4} = M3#{
 1134: 	1.0 => new_val1, 1 := update, 1=> update3,
 1135: 	1 := update2, 1.0 := new_val2, 1.0 => new_val3,
 1136: 	1.0 => new_val4 },
 1137: 
 1138:     %% Errors cases.
 1139:     do_badmap(fun(T) ->
 1140: 		      {'EXIT',{{badmap,T},_}} =
 1141: 			  (catch T#{nonexisting=>val})
 1142: 	      end),
 1143:     Empty = id(#{}),
 1144:     {'EXIT',{{badkey,nonexisting},_}} = (catch Empty#{nonexisting:=val}),
 1145:     {'EXIT',{{badkey,nonexisting},_}} = (catch M0#{nonexisting:=val}),
 1146:     {'EXIT',{{badkey,1.0},_}} = (catch M0#{1.0:=v,1.0=>v2}),
 1147:     {'EXIT',{{badkey,42},_}} = (catch M0#{42.0:=v,42:=v2}),
 1148:     {'EXIT',{{badkey,42.0},_}} = (catch M0#{42=>v1,42.0:=v2,42:=v3}),
 1149: 
 1150:     ok.
 1151: 
 1152: t_update_exact_large(Config) when is_list(Config) ->

 1227:     {'EXIT',{{badkey,nonexisting},_}} = (catch M0#{nonexisting:=val}),

 1229:     {'EXIT',{{badkey,42},_}} = (catch M0#{42.0:=v,42:=v2}),
 1230:     {'EXIT',{{badkey,42.0},_}} = (catch M0#{42=>v1,42.0:=v2,42:=v3}),
 1231: 
 1232:     ok.

 1234: t_update_deep(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1235:     N = 250000,
 1236:     M0 = maps:from_list([{integer_to_list(I),a}||I<-lists:seq(1,N)]),
 1237:     #{ "1" := a, "10" := a, "100" := a, "1000" := a, "10000" := a } = M0,
 1238: 
 1239:     M1 = M0#{ "1" := b, "10" := b, "100" := b, "1000" := b, "10000" := b },
 1240:     #{ "1" := a, "10" := a, "100" := a, "1000" := a, "10000" := a } = M0,
 1241:     #{ "1" := b, "10" := b, "100" := b, "1000" := b, "10000" := b } = M1,
 1242: 
 1243:     M2 = M0#{ "1" => c, "10" => c, "100" => c, "1000" => c, "10000" => c },
 1244:     #{ "1" := a, "10" := a, "100" := a, "1000" := a, "10000" := a } = M0,
 1245:     #{ "1" := b, "10" := b, "100" := b, "1000" := b, "10000" := b } = M1,
 1246:     #{ "1" := c, "10" := c, "100" := c, "1000" := c, "10000" := c } = M2,
 1247: 
 1248:     M3 = M2#{ "n1" => d, "n10" => d, "n100" => d, "n1000" => d, "n10000" => d },
 1249:     #{  "1" := a,  "10" := a,  "100" := a,  "1000" := a,  "10000" := a } = M0,
 1250:     #{  "1" := b,  "10" := b,  "100" := b,  "1000" := b,  "10000" := b } = M1,
 1251:     #{  "1" := c,  "10" := c,  "100" := c,  "1000" := c,  "10000" := c } = M2,
 1252:     #{  "1" := c,  "10" := c,  "100" := c,  "1000" := c,  "10000" := c } = M3,
 1253:     #{ "n1" := d, "n10" := d, "n100" := d, "n1000" := d, "n10000" := d } = M3,
 1254:     ok.
 1255: 
 1256: t_guard_bifs(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1257:     true   = map_guard_head(#{a=>1}),
 1258:     false  = map_guard_head([]),
 1259:     true   = map_guard_body(#{a=>1}),
 1260:     false  = map_guard_body({}),
 1261:     true   = map_guard_pattern(#{a=>1, <<"hi">> => "hi" }),
 1262:     false  = map_guard_pattern("list"),
 1263:     ok.
 1264: 
 1265: map_guard_head(M) when is_map(M) -> true;
 1266: map_guard_head(_) -> false.
 1267: 
 1268: map_guard_body(M) -> is_map(M).
 1269: 
 1270: map_guard_pattern(#{}) -> true;
 1271: map_guard_pattern(_)   -> false.
 1272: 
 1273: t_guard_sequence(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1274: 	{1, "a"} = map_guard_sequence_1(#{seq=>1,val=>id("a")}),
 1275: 	{2, "b"} = map_guard_sequence_1(#{seq=>2,val=>id("b")}),
 1276: 	{3, "c"} = map_guard_sequence_1(#{seq=>3,val=>id("c")}),
 1277: 	{4, "d"} = map_guard_sequence_1(#{seq=>4,val=>id("d")}),
 1278: 	{5, "e"} = map_guard_sequence_1(#{seq=>5,val=>id("e")}),
 1279: 
 1280: 	{1,M1}       = map_guard_sequence_2(M1 = id(#{a=>3})),
 1281: 	{2,M2}       = map_guard_sequence_2(M2 = id(#{a=>4, b=>4})),
 1282: 	{3,gg,M3}    = map_guard_sequence_2(M3 = id(#{a=>gg, b=>4})),
 1283: 	{4,sc,sc,M4} = map_guard_sequence_2(M4 = id(#{a=>sc, b=>3, c=>sc2})),
 1284: 	{5,kk,kk,M5} = map_guard_sequence_2(M5 = id(#{a=>kk, b=>other, c=>sc2})),
 1285: 
 1286: 	%% error case
 1287: 	{'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch map_guard_sequence_1(#{seq=>6,val=>id("e")})),
 1288: 	{'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch map_guard_sequence_2(#{b=>5})),
 1289: 	ok.
 1290:

 1359: 
 1360: 
 1361: map_guard_sequence_1(#{seq:=1=Seq, val:=Val}) -> {Seq,Val};
 1362: map_guard_sequence_1(#{seq:=2=Seq, val:=Val}) -> {Seq,Val};
 1363: map_guard_sequence_1(#{seq:=3=Seq, val:=Val}) -> {Seq,Val};
 1364: map_guard_sequence_1(#{seq:=4=Seq, val:=Val}) -> {Seq,Val};
 1365: map_guard_sequence_1(#{seq:=5=Seq, val:=Val}) -> {Seq,Val}.
 1366: 
 1367: map_guard_sequence_2(#{ a:=3 }=M) -> {1, M};
 1368: map_guard_sequence_2(#{ a:=4 }=M) -> {2, M};
 1369: map_guard_sequence_2(#{ a:=X, a:=X, b:=4 }=M) -> {3,X,M};
 1370: map_guard_sequence_2(#{ a:=X, a:=Y, b:=3 }=M) when X =:= Y -> {4,X,Y,M};
 1371: map_guard_sequence_2(#{ a:=X, a:=Y }=M) when X =:= Y -> {5,X,Y,M}.
 1372: 
 1373: 
 1374: t_guard_update(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1375:     error  = map_guard_update(#{},#{}),
 1376:     first  = map_guard_update(#{}, #{x=>first}),
 1377:     second = map_guard_update(#{y=>old}, #{x=>second,y=>old}),
 1378:     ok.
 1379:

 1411:                   12=>a2,22=>b2,32=>"c2","42"=>"d2",<<"52">>=>"e2",{["02"]}=>"12",
 1412:                   13=>a3,23=>b3,33=>"c3","43"=>"d3",<<"53">>=>"e3",{["03"]}=>"13",
 1413:                   14=>a4,24=>b4,34=>"c4","44"=>"d4",<<"54">>=>"e4",{["04"]}=>"14",
 1414: 
 1415:                   15=>a5,25=>b5,35=>"c5","45"=>"d5",<<"55">>=>"e5",{["05"]}=>"15",
 1416:                   16=>a6,26=>b6,36=>"c6","46"=>"d6",<<"56">>=>"e6",{["06"]}=>"16",
 1417:                   17=>a7,27=>b7,37=>"c7","47"=>"d7",<<"57">>=>"e7",{["07"]}=>"17",
 1418:                   18=>a8,28=>b8,38=>"c8","48"=>"d8",<<"58">>=>"e8",{["08"]}=>"18",
 1419:                   19=>a9,29=>b9,39=>"c9","49"=>"d9",<<"59">>=>"e9",{["09"]}=>"19" } => "large map key 1",
 1420: 
 1421:                #{ 10=>a0,20=>b0,30=>"c0","40"=>"d0",<<"50">>=>"e0",{["00"]}=>"10",
 1422:                   11=>a1,21=>b1,31=>"c1","41"=>"d1",<<"51">>=>"e1",{["01"]}=>"11",
 1423:                   12=>a2,22=>b2,32=>"c2","42"=>"d2",<<"52">>=>"e2",{["02"]}=>"12",
 1424:                   13=>a3,23=>b3,33=>"c3","43"=>"d3",<<"53">>=>"e3",{["03"]}=>"13",
 1425:                   14=>a4,24=>b4,34=>"c4","44"=>"d4",<<"54">>=>"e4",{["04"]}=>"14",
 1426: 
 1427:                   15=>a5,25=>b5,35=>"c5","45"=>"d5",<<"55">>=>"e5",{["05"]}=>"15",
 1428:                   k16=>a6,k26=>b6,k36=>"c6","46"=>"d6",<<"56">>=>"e6",{["06"]}=>"16",
 1429:                   17=>a7,27=>b7,37=>"c7","47"=>"d7",<<"57">>=>"e7",{["07"]}=>"17",
 1430:                   18=>a8,28=>b8,38=>"c8","48"=>"d8",<<"58">>=>"e8",{["08"]}=>"18",
 1431:                   19=>a9,29=>b9,39=>"c9","49"=>"d9",<<"59">>=>"e9",{["09"]}=>"19" } => "large map key 2" }),
 1432: 
 1433: 
 1434:     error  = map_guard_update(M0#{},M0#{}),
 1435:     first  = map_guard_update(M0#{},M0#{x=>first}),
 1436:     second = map_guard_update(M0#{y=>old}, M0#{x=>second,y=>old}),
 1437:     ok.
 1438: 
 1439: 
 1440: map_guard_update(M1, M2) when M1#{x=>first}  =:= M2 -> first;
 1441: map_guard_update(M1, M2) when M1#{x=>second} =:= M2 -> second;
 1442: map_guard_update(_, _) -> error.
 1443: 
 1444: t_guard_receive(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1445:     M0  = #{ id => 0 },
 1446:     Pid = spawn_link(fun() -> guard_receive_loop() end),
 1447:     Big = 36893488147419103229,
 1448:     B1  = <<"some text">>,
 1449:     B2  = <<"was appended">>,
 1450:     B3  = <<B1/binary, B2/binary>>,
 1451: 
 1452:     #{id:=1, res:=Big} = M1 = call(Pid, M0#{op=>sub,in=>{1 bsl 65, 3}}),
 1453:     #{id:=2, res:=26}  = M2 = call(Pid, M1#{op=>idiv,in=>{53,2}}),
 1454:     #{id:=3, res:=832} = M3 = call(Pid, M2#{op=>imul,in=>{26,32}}),
 1455:     #{id:=4, res:=4}   = M4 = call(Pid, M3#{op=>add,in=>{1,3}}),
 1456:     #{id:=5, res:=Big} = M5 = call(Pid, M4#{op=>sub,in=>{1 bsl 65, 3}}),
 1457:     #{id:=6, res:=B3}  = M6 = call(Pid, M5#{op=>"append",in=>{B1,B2}}),
 1458:     #{id:=7, res:=4}   = _  = call(Pid, M6#{op=>add,in=>{1,3}}),
 1459: 
 1460: 
 1461:     %% update old maps and check id update
 1462:     #{id:=2, res:=B3} = call(Pid, M1#{op=>"append",in=>{B1,B2}}),
 1463:     #{id:=5, res:=99} = call(Pid, M4#{op=>add,in=>{33, 66}}),
 1464: 
 1465:     %% cleanup
 1466:     done = call(Pid, done),
 1467:     ok.
 1468: 
 1469: -define(t_guard_receive_large_procs, 1500).
 1470: 
 1471: t_guard_receive_large(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1472:     M = lists:foldl(fun(_,#{procs := Ps } = M) ->
 1473:                             M#{ procs := Ps#{ spawn_link(fun() -> grecv_loop() end) => 0 }}
 1474:                     end, #{procs => #{}, done => 0}, lists:seq(1,?t_guard_receive_large_procs)),
 1475:     lists:foreach(fun(Pid) ->
 1476:                           Pid ! {self(), hello}
 1477:                   end, maps:keys(maps:get(procs,M))),
 1478:     ok = guard_receive_large_loop(M),
 1479:     ok.
 1480: 
 1481: guard_receive_large_loop(#{done := ?t_guard_receive_large_procs}) ->
 1482:     ok;
 1483: guard_receive_large_loop(M) ->
 1484:     receive
 1485:         #{pid := Pid, msg := hello} ->
 1486:             case M of
 1487:                 #{done := Count, procs := #{Pid := 150}} ->
 1488:                     Pid ! {self(), done},
 1489:                     guard_receive_large_loop(M#{done := Count + 1});
 1490:                 #{procs := #{Pid := Count} = Ps} ->
 1491:                     Pid ! {self(), hello},
 1492:                     guard_receive_large_loop(M#{procs := Ps#{Pid := Count + 1}})
 1493:             end
 1494:     end.
 1495: 
 1496: grecv_loop() ->
 1497:     receive
 1498:         {_, done} ->
 1499:             ok;
 1500:         {Pid, hello} ->
 1501:             Pid ! #{pid=>self(), msg=>hello},
 1502:             grecv_loop()
 1503:     end.
 1504: 
 1505: call(Pid, M) ->
 1506:     Pid ! {self(), M}, receive {Pid, Res} -> Res end.
 1507: 
 1508: guard_receive_loop() ->
 1509:     receive
 1510: 	{Pid, #{ id:=Id, op:="append", in:={X,Y}}=M} when is_binary(X), is_binary(Y) ->
 1511: 	    Pid ! {self(), M#{ id=>Id+1, res=><<X/binary,Y/binary>>}},
 1512: 	    guard_receive_loop();
 1513: 	{Pid, #{ id:=Id, op:=add, in:={X,Y}}} ->
 1514: 	    Pid ! {self(), #{ id=>Id+1, res=>X+Y}},
 1515: 	    guard_receive_loop();
 1516: 	{Pid, #{ id:=Id, op:=sub,  in:={X,Y}}=M} ->
 1517: 	    Pid ! {self(), M#{ id=>Id+1, res=>X-Y}},
 1518: 	    guard_receive_loop();
 1519: 	{Pid, #{ id:=Id, op:=idiv, in:={X,Y}}=M} ->
 1520: 	    Pid ! {self(), M#{ id=>Id+1, res=>X div Y}},
 1521: 	    guard_receive_loop();
 1522: 	{Pid, #{ id:=Id, op:=imul, in:={X,Y}}=M} ->
 1523: 	    Pid ! {self(), M#{ id=>Id+1, res=>X * Y}},
 1524: 	    guard_receive_loop();
 1525: 	{Pid, done} ->
 1526: 	    Pid ! {self(), done};
 1527: 	{Pid, Other} ->
 1528: 	    Pid ! {error, Other},
 1529: 	    guard_receive_loop()
 1530:     end.
 1531: 
 1532: 
 1533: t_list_comprehension(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1534:     [#{k:=1},#{k:=2},#{k:=3}] = [#{k=>I} || I <- [1,2,3]],
 1535: 
 1536:     Ks = lists:seq($a,$z),
 1537:     Ms = [#{[K1,K2]=>{K1,K2}} || K1 <- Ks, K2 <- Ks],
 1538:     [#{"aa" := {$a,$a}},#{"ab":={$a,$b}}|_] = Ms,
 1539:     [#{"zz" := {$z,$z}},#{"zy":={$z,$y}}|_] = lists:reverse(Ms),
 1540:     ok.
 1541: 
 1542: t_guard_fun(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1543:     F1 = fun
 1544: 	    (#{s:=v,v:=V})     -> {v,V};
 1545: 	    (#{s:=t,v:={V,V}}) -> {t,V};
 1546: 	    (#{s:=l,v:=[V,V]}) -> {l,V}
 1547:     end,
 1548:     
 1549:     F2 = fun
 1550: 	    (#{s:=T,v:={V,V}}) -> {T,V};
 1551: 	    (#{s:=T,v:=[V,V]}) -> {T,V};
 1552: 	    (#{s:=T,v:=V})     -> {T,V}
 1553:     end,
 1554:     V = <<"hi">>,
 1555: 
 1556:     {v,V} = F1(#{s=>v,v=>V}),
 1557:     {t,V} = F1(#{s=>t,v=>{V,V}}),
 1558:     {l,V} = F1(#{s=>l,v=>[V,V]}),
 1559: 
 1560:     {v,V} = F2(#{s=>v,v=>V}),
 1561:     {t,V} = F2(#{s=>t,v=>{V,V}}),
 1562:     {l,V} = F2(#{s=>l,v=>[V,V]}),
 1563: 
 1564:     %% error case
 1565:     {'EXIT', {function_clause,[{?MODULE,_,[#{s:=none,v:=none}],_}|_]}} = (catch F1(#{s=>none,v=>none})),
 1566:     ok.
 1567: 
 1568: 
 1569: t_map_sort_literals(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1570:     % test relation
 1571: 
 1572:     %% size order
 1573:     true  = #{ a => 1, b => 2} < id(#{ a => 1, b => 1, c => 1}),
 1574:     true  = #{ b => 1, a => 1} < id(#{ c => 1, a => 1, b => 1}),
 1575:     false = #{ c => 1, b => 1, a => 1} < id(#{ c => 1, a => 1}),
 1576: 
 1577:     %% key order
 1578:     true  = #{ a => 1 } < id(#{ b => 1}),
 1579:     false = #{ b => 1 } < id(#{ a => 1}),
 1580:     true  = #{ a => 1, b => 1, c => 1 } < id(#{ b => 1, c => 1, d => 1}),
 1581:     true  = #{ b => 1, c => 1, d => 1 } > id(#{ a => 1, b => 1, c => 1}),
 1582:     true  = #{ c => 1, b => 1, a => 1 } < id(#{ b => 1, c => 1, d => 1}),
 1583:     true  = #{ "a" => 1 } < id(#{ <<"a">> => 1}),
 1584:     false = #{ <<"a">> => 1 } < id(#{ "a" => 1}),
 1585:     true  = #{ 1 => 1 } < id(#{ 1.0 => 1}),
 1586:     false = #{ 1.0 => 1 } < id(#{ 1 => 1}),
 1587: 
 1588:     %% value order
 1589:     true  = #{ a => 1 } < id(#{ a => 2}),
 1590:     false = #{ a => 2 } < id(#{ a => 1}),
 1591:     false = #{ a => 2, b => 1 } < id(#{ a => 1, b => 3}),
 1592:     true  = #{ a => 1, b => 1 } < id(#{ a => 1, b => 3}),
 1593:     false = #{ a => 1 } < id(#{ a => 1.0}),
 1594:     false = #{ a => 1.0 } < id(#{ a => 1}),
 1595: 
 1596:     true  = #{ "a" => "hi", b => 134 } == id(#{ b => 134,"a" => "hi"}),
 1597: 
 1598:     %% large maps
 1599: 
 1600:     M = maps:from_list([{I,I}||I <- lists:seq(1,500)]),
 1601: 
 1602:     %% size order
 1603:     true  = M#{ a => 1, b => 2} < id(M#{ a => 1, b => 1, c => 1}),
 1604:     true  = M#{ b => 1, a => 1} < id(M#{ c => 1, a => 1, b => 1}),
 1605:     false = M#{ c => 1, b => 1, a => 1} < id(M#{ c => 1, a => 1}),
 1606: 
 1607:     %% key order
 1608:     true  = M#{ a => 1 } < id(M#{ b => 1}),
 1609:     false = M#{ b => 1 } < id(M#{ a => 1}),
 1610:     true  = M#{ a => 1, b => 1, c => 1 } < id(M#{ b => 1, c => 1, d => 1}),
 1611:     true  = M#{ b => 1, c => 1, d => 1 } > id(M#{ a => 1, b => 1, c => 1}),
 1612:     true  = M#{ c => 1, b => 1, a => 1 } < id(M#{ b => 1, c => 1, d => 1}),
 1613:     true  = M#{ "a" => 1 } < id(M#{ <<"a">> => 1}),
 1614:     false = M#{ <<"a">> => 1 } < id(#{ "a" => 1}),
 1615:     true  = M#{ 1 => 1 } < id(maps:remove(1,M#{ 1.0 => 1})),
 1616:     false = M#{ 1.0 => 1 } < id(M#{ 1 => 1}),
 1617: 
 1618:     %% value order
 1619:     true  = M#{ a => 1 } < id(M#{ a => 2}),
 1620:     false = M#{ a => 2 } < id(M#{ a => 1}),
 1621:     false = M#{ a => 2, b => 1 } < id(M#{ a => 1, b => 3}),
 1622:     true  = M#{ a => 1, b => 1 } < id(M#{ a => 1, b => 3}),
 1623:     false = M#{ a => 1 } < id(M#{ a => 1.0}),
 1624:     false = M#{ a => 1.0 } < id(M#{ a => 1}),
 1625: 
 1626:     true  = M#{ "a" => "hi", b => 134 } == id(M#{ b => 134,"a" => "hi"}),
 1627: 
 1628:     %% lists:sort
 1629: 
 1630:     SortVs = [#{"a"=>1},#{a=>2},#{1=>3},#{<<"a">>=>4}],
 1631:     [#{1:=ok},#{a:=ok},#{"a":=ok},#{<<"a">>:=ok}] = lists:sort([#{"a"=>ok},#{a=>ok},#{1=>ok},#{<<"a">>=>ok}]),
 1632:     [#{1:=3},#{a:=2},#{"a":=1},#{<<"a">>:=4}] = lists:sort(SortVs),
 1633:     [#{1:=3},#{a:=2},#{"a":=1},#{<<"a">>:=4}] = lists:sort(lists:reverse(SortVs)),
 1634:     ok.
 1635: 
 1636: t_map_equal(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1637:     true  = id(#{}) =:= id(#{}),
 1638:     false = id(#{}) =:= id(#{a=>1}),
 1639:     false = id(#{a=>1}) =:= id(#{}),
 1640:     true  = id(#{ "a" => "hi", b => 134 }) =:= id(#{ b => 134,"a" => "hi"}),
 1641: 
 1642:     false = id(#{ a => 1 }) =:= id(#{ a => 2}),
 1643:     false = id(#{ a => 2 }) =:= id(#{ a => 1}),
 1644:     false = id(#{ a => 2, b => 1 }) =:= id(#{ a => 1, b => 3}),
 1645:     false = id(#{ a => 1, b => 1 }) =:= id(#{ a => 1, b => 3}),
 1646: 
 1647:     true = id(#{ a => 1 }) =:= id(#{ a => 1}),
 1648:     true = id(#{ "a" => 2 }) =:= id(#{ "a" => 2}),
 1649:     true = id(#{ "a" => 2, b => 3 }) =:= id(#{ "a" => 2, b => 3}),
 1650:     true = id(#{ a => 1, b => 3, c => <<"wat">> }) =:= id(#{ a => 1, b => 3, c=><<"wat">>}),
 1651:     ok.
 1652: 
 1653: 
 1654: t_map_compare(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1655:     rand:seed(exsplus),
 1656:     io:format("seed = ~p\n", [rand:export_seed()]),
 1657:     repeat(100, fun(_) -> float_int_compare() end, []),
 1658:     repeat(100, fun(_) -> recursive_compare() end, []),
 1659:     repeat(10, fun(_) -> atoms_compare() end, []),
 1660:     ok.
 1661: 
 1662: float_int_compare() ->
 1663:     Terms = numeric_keys(3),
 1664:     %%io:format("Keys to use: ~p\n", [Terms]),
 1665:     Pairs = lists:map(fun(K) -> list_to_tuple([{K,V} || V <- Terms]) end, Terms),
 1666:     lists:foreach(fun(Size) ->
 1667: 			  MapGen = fun() -> map_gen(Pairs, Size) end,
 1668: 			  repeat(100, fun do_compare/1, [MapGen, MapGen])
 1669: 		  end,
 1670: 		  lists:seq(1,length(Terms))),
 1671:     ok.
 1672: 
 1673: atoms_compare() ->
 1674:     Atoms = [true, false, ok, '', ?MODULE, list_to_atom(id("a new atom"))],
 1675:     Pairs = lists:map(fun(K) -> list_to_tuple([{K,V} || V <- Atoms]) end,
 1676:                       Atoms),
 1677:     lists:foreach(
 1678:       fun(Size) ->
 1679:               M1 = map_gen(Pairs, Size),
 1680:               M2 = map_gen(Pairs, Size),
 1681:               %%io:format("Atom maps to compare: ~p AND ~p\n", [M1, M2]),
 1682:               do_cmp(M1, M2)
 1683:       end,
 1684:       lists:seq(1,length(Atoms))),
 1685:     ok.
 1686: 
 1687: numeric_keys(N) ->
 1688:     lists:foldl(fun(_,Acc) ->
 1689: 			Int = rand:uniform(N*4) - N*2,
 1690: 			Float = float(Int),
 1691: 			[Int, Float, Float * 0.99, Float * 1.01 | Acc]
 1692: 		end,
 1693: 		[],
 1694: 		lists:seq(1,N)).
 1695: 
 1696: 
 1697: repeat(0, _, _) ->
 1698:     ok;
 1699: repeat(N, Fun, Arg) ->
 1700:     Fun(Arg),
 1701:     repeat(N-1, Fun, Arg).
 1702: 
 1703: copy_term(T) ->
 1704:     Papa = self(),
 1705:     P = spawn_link(fun() -> receive Msg -> Papa ! Msg end end),
 1706:     P ! T,
 1707:     receive R -> R end.
 1708: 
 1709: do_compare([Gen1, Gen2]) ->
 1710:     M1 = Gen1(),
 1711:     M2 = Gen2(),
 1712:     %%io:format("Maps to compare: ~p AND ~p\n", [M1, M2]),
 1713:     C = (M1 < M2),
 1714:     Erlang = maps_lessthan(M1, M2),
 1715:     C = Erlang,
 1716:     ?CHECK(M1==M1, M1),
 1717: 
 1718:     %% Change one key from int to float (or vice versa) and check compare
 1719:     ML1 = maps:to_list(M1),
 1720:     {K1,V1} = lists:nth(rand:uniform(length(ML1)), ML1),
 1721:     case K1 of
 1722: 	I when is_integer(I) ->
 1723: 	    case maps:find(float(I),M1) of
 1724: 		error ->
 1725: 		    M1f = maps:remove(I, maps:put(float(I), V1, M1)),
 1726: 		    ?CHECK(M1f > M1, [M1f, M1]);
 1727: 		_ -> ok
 1728: 	    end;
 1729: 
 1730: 	F when is_float(F), round(F) == F ->
 1731: 	    case maps:find(round(F),M1) of
 1732: 		error ->
 1733: 		    M1i = maps:remove(F, maps:put(round(F), V1, M1)),
 1734: 		    ?CHECK(M1i < M1, [M1i, M1]);
 1735: 		_ -> ok
 1736: 	    end;
 1737: 
 1738: 	_ -> ok   % skip floats with decimals
 1739:     end,
 1740: 
 1741:     ?CHECK(M2 == M2, [M2]).
 1742: 
 1743: 
 1744: maps_lessthan(M1, M2) ->
 1745:   case {maps:size(M1),maps:size(M2)} of
 1746:       {S,S} ->
 1747: 	  {K1,V1} = lists:unzip(term_sort(maps:to_list(M1))),
 1748: 	  {K2,V2} = lists:unzip(term_sort(maps:to_list(M2))),
 1749: 
 1750: 	  case erts_internal:cmp_term(K1,K2) of
 1751: 	      -1 -> true;
 1752: 	      0 -> (V1 < V2);
 1753: 	      1 -> false
 1754: 	  end;
 1755: 
 1756:       {S1, S2} ->
 1757: 	  S1 < S2
 1758:   end.
 1759: 
 1760: term_sort(L) ->
 1761:     lists:sort(fun(A,B) -> erts_internal:cmp_term(A,B) =< 0 end,
 1762: 	       L).
 1763: 
 1764: 
 1765: cmp(T1, T2, Exact) when is_tuple(T1), is_tuple(T2) ->
 1766:     case {tuple_size(T1),tuple_size(T2)} of
 1767: 	{S,S} -> cmp(tuple_to_list(T1), tuple_to_list(T2), Exact);
 1768: 	{S1,S2} when S1 < S2 -> -1;
 1769: 	{S1,S2} when S1 > S2 -> 1
 1770:     end;
 1771: 
 1772: cmp([H1|T1], [H2|T2], Exact) ->
 1773:     case cmp(H1,H2, Exact) of
 1774: 	0 -> cmp(T1,T2, Exact);
 1775: 	C -> C
 1776:     end;
 1777: 
 1778: cmp(M1, M2, Exact) when is_map(M1) andalso is_map(M2) ->
 1779:     cmp_maps(M1,M2,Exact);
 1780: cmp(M1, M2, Exact) ->
 1781:     cmp_others(M1, M2, Exact).
 1782: 
 1783: cmp_maps(M1, M2, Exact) ->
 1784:     case {maps:size(M1),maps:size(M2)} of
 1785: 	{S,S} ->
 1786: 	    {K1,V1} = lists:unzip(term_sort(maps:to_list(M1))),
 1787: 	    {K2,V2} = lists:unzip(term_sort(maps:to_list(M2))),
 1788: 
 1789: 	    case cmp(K1, K2, true) of
 1790: 		0 -> cmp(V1, V2, Exact);
 1791: 		C -> C
 1792: 	    end;
 1793: 
 1794: 	{S1,S2} when S1 < S2 -> -1;
 1795: 	{S1,S2} when S1 > S2 -> 1
 1796:     end.
 1797: 
 1798: cmp_others(I, F, true) when is_integer(I), is_float(F) ->
 1799:     -1;
 1800: cmp_others(F, I, true) when is_float(F), is_integer(I) ->
 1801:     1;
 1802: cmp_others(A1, A2, Exact) when is_atom(A1), is_atom(A2) ->
 1803:     cmp_others(atom_to_list(A1), atom_to_list(A2), Exact);
 1804: cmp_others(T1, T2, _) ->
 1805:     case {T1<T2, T1==T2} of
 1806: 	{true,false} -> -1;
 1807: 	{false,true} -> 0;
 1808: 	{false,false} -> 1
 1809:     end.
 1810: 
 1811: map_gen(Pairs, Size) ->
 1812:     {_,L} = lists:foldl(fun(_, {Keys, Acc}) ->
 1813: 				KI = rand:uniform(size(Keys)),
 1814: 				K = element(KI,Keys),
 1815: 				KV = element(rand:uniform(size(K)), K),
 1816: 				{erlang:delete_element(KI,Keys), [KV | Acc]}
 1817: 			end,
 1818: 			{list_to_tuple(Pairs), []},
 1819: 			lists:seq(1,Size)),
 1820: 
 1821:     maps:from_list(L).
 1822: 
 1823: 
 1824: recursive_compare() ->
 1825:     Leafs = {atom, 17, 16.9, 17.1, [], self(), spawn(fun() -> ok end), make_ref(), make_ref()},
 1826:     {A, B} = term_gen_recursive(Leafs, 0, 0),
 1827:     %%io:format("Recursive term A = ~p\n", [A]),
 1828:     %%io:format("Recursive term B = ~p\n", [B]),
 1829: 
 1830:     do_cmp(A, B),
 1831: 
 1832:     A2 = copy_term(A),
 1833:     ?CHECK(A == A2, {A,A2}),
 1834:     ?CHECK(0 =:= cmp(A, A2, false), {A,A2}),
 1835: 
 1836:     B2 = copy_term(B),
 1837:     ?CHECK(B == B2, {B,B2}),
 1838:     ?CHECK(0 =:= cmp(B, B2, false), {B,B2}),
 1839:     ok.
 1840: 
 1841: do_cmp(A, B) ->
 1842:     ?CHECK({true,false} =:=  case cmp(A, B, false) of
 1843: 				 -1 -> {A<B, A>=B};
 1844: 				 0 -> {A==B, A/=B};
 1845: 				 1 -> {A>B, A=<B}
 1846: 			     end,
 1847: 	   {A,B}).
 1848: 
 1849: %% Generate two terms {A,B} that may only differ
 1850: %% at float vs integer types.
 1851: term_gen_recursive(Leafs, Flags, Depth) ->
 1852:     MaxDepth = 10,
 1853:     Rnd = case {Flags, Depth} of
 1854: 	      {_, MaxDepth} -> % Only leafs
 1855: 		  rand:uniform(size(Leafs)) + 3;
 1856: 	      {0, 0} ->        % Only containers
 1857: 		  rand:uniform(3);
 1858: 	      {0,_} ->         % Anything
 1859: 		  rand:uniform(size(Leafs)+3)
 1860: 	  end,
 1861:     case Rnd of
 1862: 	1 -> % Make map
 1863: 	    Size = rand:uniform(size(Leafs)),
 1864: 	    lists:foldl(fun(_, {Acc1,Acc2}) ->
 1865: 				{K1,K2} = term_gen_recursive(Leafs, Flags,
 1866: 							     Depth+1),
 1867: 				{V1,V2} = term_gen_recursive(Leafs, Flags, Depth+1),
 1868: 				{maps:put(K1,V1, Acc1), maps:put(K2,V2, Acc2)}
 1869: 			end,
 1870: 			{maps:new(), maps:new()},
 1871: 			lists:seq(1,Size));
 1872: 	2 -> % Make cons
 1873: 	    {Car1,Car2} = term_gen_recursive(Leafs, Flags, Depth+1),
 1874: 	    {Cdr1,Cdr2} = term_gen_recursive(Leafs, Flags, Depth+1),
 1875: 	    {[Car1 | Cdr1], [Car2 | Cdr2]};
 1876: 	3 -> % Make tuple
 1877: 	    Size = rand:uniform(size(Leafs)),
 1878: 	    L = lists:map(fun(_) -> term_gen_recursive(Leafs, Flags, Depth+1) end,
 1879: 			  lists:seq(1,Size)),
 1880: 	    {L1, L2} = lists:unzip(L),
 1881: 	    {list_to_tuple(L1), list_to_tuple(L2)};
 1882: 
 1883: 	N -> % Make leaf
 1884: 	    case element(N-3, Leafs) of
 1885: 		I when is_integer(I) ->
 1886: 		    case rand:uniform(4) of
 1887: 			1 -> {I, float(I)};
 1888: 			2 -> {float(I), I};
 1889: 			_ -> {I,I}
 1890: 		    end;
 1891: 		T -> {T,T}
 1892: 	    end
 1893:     end.
 1894: 
 1895: 
 1896: %% BIFs
 1897: t_bif_map_get(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1898:     %% small map
 1899:     1    = maps:get(a, #{ a=> 1}),
 1900:     2    = maps:get(b, #{ a=> 1, b => 2}),
 1901:     "hi" = maps:get("hello", #{ a=>1, "hello" => "hi"}),
 1902:     "tuple hi" = maps:get({1,1.0}, #{ a=>a, {1,1.0} => "tuple hi"}),
 1903: 
 1904:     M0    = id(#{ k1=>"v1", <<"k2">> => <<"v3">> }),
 1905:     "v4" = maps:get(<<"k2">>, M0#{<<"k2">> => "v4"}),
 1906: 
 1907:     %% large map
 1908:     M1   = maps:from_list([{I,I}||I<-lists:seq(1,100)] ++
 1909: 			  [{a,1},{b,2},{"hello","hi"},{{1,1.0},"tuple hi"},
 1910: 			   {k1,"v1"},{<<"k2">>,"v3"}]),
 1911:     1    = maps:get(a, M1),
 1912:     2    = maps:get(b, M1),
 1913:     "hi" = maps:get("hello", M1),
 1914:     "tuple hi" = maps:get({1,1.0}, M1),
 1915:     "v3" = maps:get(<<"k2">>, M1),
 1916: 
 1917:     %% error cases
 1918:     %%
 1919:     %% Note that the stack trace is ignored because the compiler may have
 1920:     %% rewritten maps:get/2 to map_get.
 1921:     do_badmap(fun(T) ->
 1922: 		      {'EXIT',{{badmap,T},_}} =
 1923: 			  (catch maps:get(a, T))
 1924: 	      end),
 1925: 
 1926:     {'EXIT',{{badkey,{1,1}},_}} =
 1927: 	(catch maps:get({1,1}, #{{1,1.0} => "tuple"})),
 1928:     {'EXIT',{{badkey,a},_}} = (catch maps:get(a, #{})),
 1929:     {'EXIT',{{badkey,a},_}} =
 1930: 	(catch maps:get(a, #{b=>1, c=>2})),
 1931:     ok.
 1932: 
 1933: t_bif_map_find(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1934:     %% small map
 1935:     {ok, 1}     = maps:find(a, #{ a=> 1}),
 1936:     {ok, 2}     = maps:find(b, #{ a=> 1, b => 2}),
 1937:     {ok, "int"} = maps:find(1, #{ 1   => "int"}),
 1938:     {ok, "float"} = maps:find(1.0, #{ 1.0=> "float"}),
 1939: 
 1940:     {ok, "hi"} = maps:find("hello", #{ a=>1, "hello" => "hi"}),
 1941:     {ok, "tuple hi"} = maps:find({1,1.0}, #{ a=>a, {1,1.0} => "tuple hi"}),
 1942: 
 1943:     M0 = id(#{ k1=>"v1", <<"k2">> => <<"v3">> }),
 1944:     {ok, "v4"} = maps:find(<<"k2">>, M0#{ <<"k2">> => "v4" }),
 1945: 
 1946:     %% large map
 1947:     M1   = maps:from_list([{I,I}||I<-lists:seq(1,100)] ++
 1948: 			  [{a,1},{b,2},{"hello","hi"},{{1,1.0},"tuple hi"},
 1949: 			   {k1,"v1"},{<<"k2">>,"v3"}]),
 1950:     {ok, 1}    = maps:find(a, M1),
 1951:     {ok, 2}    = maps:find(b, M1),
 1952:     {ok, "hi"} = maps:find("hello", M1),
 1953:     {ok, "tuple hi"} = maps:find({1,1.0}, M1),
 1954:     {ok, "v3"} = maps:find(<<"k2">>, M1),
 1955: 
 1956:     %% error case
 1957:     error = maps:find(a,#{}),
 1958:     error = maps:find(a,#{b=>1, c=>2}),
 1959:     error = maps:find(1.0, #{ 1 => "int"}),
 1960:     error = maps:find(1, #{ 1.0  => "float"}),
 1961:     error = maps:find({1.0,1}, #{ a=>a, {1,1.0} => "tuple hi"}), % reverse types in tuple key
 1962: 
 1963:     do_badmap(fun(T) ->
 1964: 		      {'EXIT',{{badmap,T},[{maps,find,_,_}|_]}} =
 1965: 			  (catch maps:find(a, T))
 1966: 	      end),
 1967:     ok.
 1968: 
 1969: 
 1970: t_bif_map_is_key(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1971:     M1 = #{ "hi" => "hello", int => 3, <<"key">> => <<"value">>, 4 => number},
 1972: 
 1973:     true  = maps:is_key("hi", M1),
 1974:     true  = maps:is_key(int, M1),
 1975:     true  = maps:is_key(<<"key">>, M1),
 1976:     true  = maps:is_key(4, M1),
 1977: 
 1978:     false = maps:is_key(5, M1),
 1979:     false = maps:is_key(<<"key2">>, M1),
 1980:     false = maps:is_key("h", M1),
 1981:     false = maps:is_key("hello", M1),
 1982:     false = maps:is_key(atom, M1),
 1983:     false = maps:is_key(any, id(#{})),
 1984: 
 1985:     false = maps:is_key("hi", maps:remove("hi", M1)),
 1986:     true  = maps:is_key("hi", M1),
 1987:     true  = maps:is_key(1, maps:put(1, "number", M1)),
 1988:     false = maps:is_key(1.0, maps:put(1, "number", M1)),
 1989: 
 1990:     %% error case
 1991:     %%
 1992:     %% Note that the stack trace is ignored because the compiler may have
 1993:     %% rewritten maps:is_key/2 to is_map_key.
 1994:     do_badmap(fun(T) ->
 1995: 		      {'EXIT',{{badmap,T},_}} =
 1996: 			  (catch maps:is_key(a, T))
 1997: 	      end),
 1998:     ok.
 1999: 
 2000: t_bif_map_keys(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2001:     [] = maps:keys(#{}),
 2002: 
 2003:     [1,2,3,4,5] = lists:sort(maps:keys(#{ 1 => a, 2 => b, 3 => c, 4 => d, 5 => e})),
 2004:     [1,2,3,4,5] = lists:sort(maps:keys(#{ 4 => d, 5 => e, 1 => a, 2 => b, 3 => c})),
 2005: 
 2006:     % values in key order: [4,int,"hi",<<"key">>]
 2007:     M1 = #{ "hi" => "hello", int => 3, <<"key">> => <<"value">>, 4 => number},
 2008:     [4,int,"hi",<<"key">>] = lists:sort(maps:keys(M1)),
 2009: 
 2010:     %% error case
 2011:     do_badmap(fun(T) ->
 2012: 		      {'EXIT',{{badmap,T},[{maps,keys,_,_}|_]}} =
 2013: 			  (catch maps:keys(T))
 2014: 	      end),
 2015:     ok.
 2016: 
 2017: t_bif_map_new(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2018:     #{} = maps:new(),
 2019:     0   = erlang:map_size(maps:new()),
 2020:     ok.
 2021: 
 2022: t_bif_map_merge(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2023:     0   = erlang:map_size(maps:merge(#{},#{})),
 2024: 
 2025:     M0 = #{ "hi" => "hello", int => 3, <<"key">> => <<"value">>,
 2026: 	4 => number, 18446744073709551629 => wat},
 2027: 
 2028:     #{ "hi" := "hello", int := 3, <<"key">> := <<"value">>,
 2029: 	4 := number, 18446744073709551629 := wat} = maps:merge(#{}, M0),
 2030: 
 2031:     #{ "hi" := "hello", int := 3, <<"key">> := <<"value">>,
 2032: 	4 := number, 18446744073709551629 := wat} = maps:merge(M0, #{}),
 2033: 
 2034:     M1 = #{ "hi" => "hello again", float => 3.3, {1,2} => "tuple", 4 => integer },
 2035: 
 2036:     #{4 := number, 18446744073709551629 := wat, float := 3.3, int := 3,
 2037: 	{1,2} := "tuple", "hi" := "hello", <<"key">> := <<"value">>} = maps:merge(M1,M0),
 2038: 
 2039:     #{4 := integer, 18446744073709551629 := wat, float := 3.3, int := 3,
 2040: 	{1,2} := "tuple", "hi" := "hello again", <<"key">> := <<"value">>} = maps:merge(M0,M1),
 2041: 
 2042:     %% try deep collisions
 2043:     N  = 150000,
 2044:     Is = lists:seq(1,N),
 2045:     M2 = maps:from_list([{I,I}||I<-Is]),
 2046:     150000 = maps:size(M2),
 2047:     M3 = maps:from_list([{<<I:32>>,I}||I<-Is]),
 2048:     150000 = maps:size(M3),
 2049:     M4 = maps:merge(M2,M3),
 2050:     300000 = maps:size(M4),
 2051:     M5 = maps:from_list([{integer_to_list(I),I}||I<-Is]),
 2052:     150000 = maps:size(M5),
 2053:     M6 = maps:merge(M4,M5),
 2054:     450000 = maps:size(M6),
 2055:     M7 = maps:from_list([{float(I),I}||I<-Is]),
 2056:     150000 = maps:size(M7),
 2057:     M8 = maps:merge(M7,M6),
 2058:     600000 = maps:size(M8),
 2059: 
 2060:     #{      1 := 1,           "1" := 1,           <<1:32>> := 1      } = M8,
 2061:     #{     10 := 10,         "10" := 10,         <<10:32>> := 10     } = M8,
 2062:     #{    100 := 100,       "100" := 100,       <<100:32>> := 100    } = M8,
 2063:     #{   1000 := 1000,     "1000" := 1000,     <<1000:32>> := 1000   } = M8,
 2064:     #{  10000 := 10000,   "10000" := 10000,   <<10000:32>> := 10000  } = M8,
 2065:     #{ 100000 := 100000, "100000" := 100000, <<100000:32>> := 100000 } = M8,
 2066: 
 2067:     %% overlapping
 2068:     M8 = maps:merge(M2,M8),
 2069:     M8 = maps:merge(M3,M8),
 2070:     M8 = maps:merge(M4,M8),
 2071:     M8 = maps:merge(M5,M8),
 2072:     M8 = maps:merge(M6,M8),
 2073:     M8 = maps:merge(M7,M8),
 2074:     M8 = maps:merge(M8,M8),
 2075: 
 2076:     %% maps:merge/2 and mixed
 2077: 
 2078:     Ks1 = [764492191,2361333849], %% deep collision
 2079:     Ks2 = lists:seq(1,33),
 2080:     M9  = maps:from_list([{K,K}||K <- Ks1]),
 2081:     M10 = maps:from_list([{K,K}||K <- Ks2]),
 2082:     M11 = maps:merge(M9,M10),
 2083:     ok = check_keys_exist(Ks1 ++ Ks2, M11),
 2084: 
 2085:     %% error case
 2086:     do_badmap(fun(T) ->
 2087: 		      {'EXIT',{{badmap,T},[{maps,merge,_,_}|_]}} =
 2088: 			  (catch maps:merge(#{}, T)),
 2089: 		      {'EXIT',{{badmap,T},[{maps,merge,_,_}|_]}} =
 2090: 			  (catch maps:merge(T, #{})),
 2091: 		      {'EXIT',{{badmap,T},[{maps,merge,_,_}|_]}} =
 2092: 			  (catch maps:merge(M11, T)),
 2093: 		      {'EXIT',{{badmap,T},[{maps,merge,_,_}|_]}} =
 2094: 			  (catch maps:merge(T, M11)),
 2095: 		      {'EXIT',{{badmap,T},[{maps,merge,_,_}|_]}} =
 2096: 			  (catch maps:merge(T, T))
 2097: 	      end),
 2098:     ok.
 2099: 
 2100: 
 2101: t_bif_map_put(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2102:     M0 = #{ "hi" => "hello", int => 3, <<"key">> => <<"value">>,
 2103: 	4 => number, 18446744073709551629 => wat},
 2104: 
 2105:     M1 = #{ "hi" := "hello"} = maps:put("hi", "hello", #{}),
 2106: 
 2107:     true = is_members(["hi"],maps:keys(M1)),
 2108:     true = is_members(["hello"],maps:values(M1)),
 2109: 
 2110:     M2 = #{ int := 3 } = maps:put(int, 3, M1),
 2111: 
 2112:     true = is_members([int,"hi"],maps:keys(M2)),
 2113:     true = is_members([3,"hello"],maps:values(M2)),
 2114: 
 2115:     M3 = #{ <<"key">> := <<"value">> } = maps:put(<<"key">>, <<"value">>, M2),
 2116: 
 2117:     true = is_members([int,"hi",<<"key">>],maps:keys(M3)),
 2118:     true = is_members([3,"hello",<<"value">>],maps:values(M3)),
 2119: 
 2120:     M4 = #{ 18446744073709551629 := wat } = maps:put(18446744073709551629, wat, M3),
 2121: 
 2122:     true = is_members([18446744073709551629,int,"hi",<<"key">>],maps:keys(M4)),
 2123:     true = is_members([wat,3,"hello",<<"value">>],maps:values(M4)),
 2124: 
 2125:     M0 = #{ 4 := number } = M5 = maps:put(4, number, M4),
 2126: 
 2127:     true = is_members([4,18446744073709551629,int,"hi",<<"key">>],maps:keys(M5)),
 2128:     true = is_members([number,wat,3,"hello",<<"value">>],maps:values(M5)),
 2129: 
 2130:     M6 = #{ <<"key">> := <<"other value">> } = maps:put(<<"key">>, <<"other value">>, M5),
 2131: 
 2132:     true = is_members([4,18446744073709551629,int,"hi",<<"key">>],maps:keys(M6)),
 2133:     true = is_members([number,wat,3,"hello",<<"other value">>],maps:values(M6)),
 2134: 
 2135:     %% error case
 2136:     do_badmap(fun(T) ->
 2137: 		      {'EXIT',{{badmap,T},[{maps,put,_,_}|_]}} =
 2138: 			  (catch maps:put(1, a, T))
 2139: 	      end),
 2140:     ok.
 2141: 
 2142: is_members(Ks,Ls) when length(Ks) =/= length(Ls) -> false;
 2143: is_members(Ks,Ls) -> is_members_do(Ks,Ls).
 2144: 
 2145: is_members_do([],[]) -> true;
 2146: is_members_do([],_) -> false;
 2147: is_members_do([K|Ks],Ls) ->
 2148:     is_members_do(Ks, lists:delete(K,Ls)).
 2149: 
 2150: t_bif_map_remove(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2151:     0  = erlang:map_size(maps:remove(some_key, #{})),
 2152: 
 2153:     M0 = #{ "hi" => "hello", int => 3, <<"key">> => <<"value">>,
 2154:             4 => number, 18446744073709551629 => wat},
 2155: 
 2156:     M1 = maps:remove("hi", M0),
 2157:     true = is_members([4,18446744073709551629,int,<<"key">>],maps:keys(M1)),
 2158:     true = is_members([number,wat,3,<<"value">>],maps:values(M1)),
 2159: 
 2160:     M2 = maps:remove(int, M1),
 2161:     true = is_members([4,18446744073709551629,<<"key">>],maps:keys(M2)),
 2162:     true = is_members([number,wat,<<"value">>],maps:values(M2)),
 2163: 
 2164:     M3 = maps:remove(<<"key">>, M2),
 2165:     true = is_members([4,18446744073709551629],maps:keys(M3)),
 2166:     true = is_members([number,wat],maps:values(M3)),
 2167: 
 2168:     M4 = maps:remove(18446744073709551629, M3),
 2169:     true = is_members([4],maps:keys(M4)),
 2170:     true = is_members([number],maps:values(M4)),
 2171: 
 2172:     M5 = maps:remove(4, M4),
 2173:     [] = maps:keys(M5),
 2174:     [] = maps:values(M5),
 2175: 
 2176:     M0 = maps:remove(5,M0),
 2177:     M0 = maps:remove("hi there",M0),
 2178: 
 2179:     #{ "hi" := "hello", int := 3, 4 := number} = maps:remove(18446744073709551629,maps:remove(<<"key">>,M0)),
 2180: 
 2181:     %% error case
 2182:     do_badmap(fun(T) ->
 2183: 		      {'EXIT',{{badmap,T},[{maps,remove,_,_}|_]}} = (catch maps:remove(a, T))
 2184: 	      end),
 2185:     ok.
 2186: 
 2187: t_bif_map_take(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2188:     error = maps:take(some_key, #{}),
 2189: 
 2190:     M0 = #{ "hi" => "hello", int => 3, <<"key">> => <<"value">>,
 2191:             4 => number, 18446744073709551629 => wat},
 2192: 
 2193:     5 = maps:size(M0),
 2194:     {"hello", M1} = maps:take("hi", M0),
 2195:     true = is_members([4,18446744073709551629,int,<<"key">>],maps:keys(M1)),
 2196:     true = is_members([number,wat,3,<<"value">>],maps:values(M1)),
 2197:     error = maps:take("hi", M1),
 2198:     4 = maps:size(M1),
 2199: 
 2200:     {3, M2} = maps:take(int, M1),
 2201:     true = is_members([4,18446744073709551629,<<"key">>],maps:keys(M2)),
 2202:     true = is_members([number,wat,<<"value">>],maps:values(M2)),
 2203:     error = maps:take(int, M2),
 2204:     3 = maps:size(M2),
 2205: 
 2206:     {<<"value">>,M3} = maps:take(<<"key">>, M2),
 2207:     true = is_members([4,18446744073709551629],maps:keys(M3)),
 2208:     true = is_members([number,wat],maps:values(M3)),
 2209:     error = maps:take(<<"key">>, M3),
 2210:     2 = maps:size(M3),
 2211: 
 2212:     {wat,M4} = maps:take(18446744073709551629, M3),
 2213:     true = is_members([4],maps:keys(M4)),
 2214:     true = is_members([number],maps:values(M4)),
 2215:     error = maps:take(18446744073709551629, M4),
 2216:     1 = maps:size(M4),
 2217: 
 2218:     {number,M5} = maps:take(4, M4),
 2219:     [] = maps:keys(M5),
 2220:     [] = maps:values(M5),
 2221:     error = maps:take(4, M5),
 2222:     0 = maps:size(M5),
 2223: 
 2224:     {wat,#{ "hi" := "hello", int := 3, 4 := number, <<"key">> := <<"value">>}} = maps:take(18446744073709551629,M0),
 2225: 
 2226:     %% error case
 2227:     do_badmap(fun(T) ->
 2228: 		      {'EXIT',{{badmap,T},[{maps,take,_,_}|_]}} = (catch maps:take(a, T))
 2229: 	      end),
 2230:     ok.
 2231: 
 2232: t_bif_map_take_large(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2233:     KVs = [{{erlang:md5(<<I:64>>),I}, I}|| I <- lists:seq(1,500)],
 2234:     M0 = maps:from_list(KVs),
 2235:     ok = bif_map_take_all(KVs, M0),
 2236:     ok.
 2237: 
 2238: bif_map_take_all([], M0) ->
 2239:     0 = maps:size(M0),
 2240:     ok;
 2241: bif_map_take_all([{K,V}|KVs],M0) ->
 2242:     {ok,V} = maps:find(K,M0),
 2243:     {V,M1} = maps:take(K,M0),
 2244:     error  = maps:find(K,M1),
 2245:     error  = maps:take(K,M1),
 2246:     bif_map_take_all(KVs,M1).
 2247: 
 2248: 
 2249: t_bif_map_update(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2250:     M0 = #{ "hi" => "hello", int => 3, <<"key">> => <<"value">>,
 2251: 	4 => number, 18446744073709551629 => wat},
 2252: 
 2253:     #{ "hi" := "hello again", int := 3, <<"key">> := <<"value">>,
 2254: 	4 := number, 18446744073709551629 := wat} = maps:update("hi", "hello again", M0),
 2255: 
 2256:     #{ "hi" := "hello", int := 1337, <<"key">> := <<"value">>,
 2257: 	4 := number, 18446744073709551629 := wat} = maps:update(int, 1337, M0),
 2258: 
 2259:     #{ "hi" := "hello", int := 3, <<"key">> := <<"new value">>,
 2260: 	4 := number, 18446744073709551629 := wat} = maps:update(<<"key">>, <<"new value">>, M0),
 2261: 
 2262:     #{ "hi" := "hello", int := 3, <<"key">> := <<"value">>,
 2263: 	4 := integer, 18446744073709551629 := wat} = maps:update(4, integer, M0),
 2264: 
 2265:     #{ "hi" := "hello", int := 3, <<"key">> := <<"value">>,
 2266: 	4 := number, 18446744073709551629 := wazzup} = maps:update(18446744073709551629, wazzup, M0),
 2267: 
 2268:     %% error case
 2269:     do_badmap(fun(T) ->
 2270: 		      {'EXIT',{{badmap,T},[{maps,update,_,_}|_]}} =
 2271: 			  (catch maps:update(1, none, T))
 2272: 	      end),
 2273:     ok.

 2278: 
 2279:     [] = maps:values(#{}),
 2280:     [1] = maps:values(#{a=>1}),
 2281: 
 2282:     true = is_members([a,b,c,d,e],maps:values(#{ 1 => a, 2 => b, 3 => c, 4 => d, 5 => e})),
 2283:     true = is_members([a,b,c,d,e],maps:values(#{ 4 => d, 5 => e, 1 => a, 2 => b, 3 => c})),
 2284: 
 2285:     M1 = #{ "hi" => "hello", int => 3, <<"key">> => <<"value">>, 4 => number},
 2286:     M2 = M1#{ "hi" => "hello2", <<"key">> => <<"value2">> },
 2287:     true = is_members([number,3,"hello2",<<"value2">>],maps:values(M2)),
 2288:     true = is_members([number,3,"hello",<<"value">>],maps:values(M1)),
 2289: 
 2290:     Vs = lists:seq(1000,20000),
 2291:     M3 = maps:from_list([{K,K}||K<-Vs]),
 2292:     M4 = maps:merge(M1,M3),
 2293:     M5 = maps:merge(M2,M3),
 2294:     true = is_members(Vs,maps:values(M3)),
 2295:     true = is_members([number,3,"hello",<<"value">>]++Vs,maps:values(M4)),
 2296:     true = is_members([number,3,"hello2",<<"value2">>]++Vs,maps:values(M5)),
 2297: 
 2298:     %% error case

 2300: 		      {'EXIT',{{badmap,T},[{maps,values,_,_}|_]}} =
 2301: 			  (catch maps:values(T))
 2302: 	      end),
